He'd gotten about halfway back to his place when he noticed a tall woman headed his way. Not only was she tall, but she was also pretty big and muscular - and something about her rang a bell with Clark. Without his superbrain he couldn't quite place her face, but she did seem familiar. "Maybe I've seen her on TV, on like American Ninja Warrior or something?" he thought.

As the woman got closer, Clark could size her up a little more. She was a little shorter than Clark, maybe around 5'11", and had a very well-fromed physique clad in a tight white top (that highlighted her very large breasts) and cut off jeans. Her hair was dark and curly, framing her seductive face and pouty lips. Those lips curled into a smile as she got closer to the former hero.

"Well, well, well, Clark, looks like you've put on a few pounds since we last met," she said.

Clark froze. "I'm sorry. Do I know you?"

The smile disappeared and the pouty look was back. "Clark, how can you not remember me? It's me, Lucy, from high school."

"Lucy? Lucy Lewis? You look so....different?"

"The one and only. And yes, I've changed a bit since Smallville High."

Clark's mouth dropped. "More than a bit, I'd say. You were so petite and...studious-looking back then." Clark was trying to avoid calling her mousy and nerdy, so he chose the best words he could.

Lucy flexed her biceps, and they swelled up to softball size. "Well, I was a bit of a chemistry geek back then, but all that knowledge helped me to build the body I have today. It's amazing what you can achieve through good science, Clark - it can certainly help you to pack on the muscle. But if I've changed a little, you've certainly changed a lot. You used to be so fit, but now, well..."

Lucy's words trailed off, but she poked Clark in the gut to get her point across.

Clark's face turned red. "I've had a little trouble with the weight lately. Haven't been getting much exercise."

"More than a little, I'd say. You used to have quite the buff body hidden under all those sweaters, Clark. Trust me, I paid attention. I would say you've lost most of that muscle and replaced it with 100% pure lard. I mean, you waist alone must have gone from 32 inches to 52 inches, right?" She pulled up his t-shirt to reveal his flabby, jiggly midsection. "I mean, good God, you're huge."

Clark tried to push her arm back down so that his stomach wouldn't be out in the open, but even with all his strength, he couldn't budge her arms. "Damn, she's really powerful. Lucy obviously has figured something out to improve so drastically," he thought.

Finally, after what seemed to be an eternity, Lucy let go of the hem of Clark's shirt and it fell back over his belly. "Such a shame that your body turned to pot, Clark. If only you'd hung out with me, I could have helped you keep some of that muscle and prevent this flab from piling on."

"I'd would really love to get back in shape, Lucy. It's actually a really important goal for me. Think you can help?"

Lucy nodded. "I can indeed. In fact, let's go to..."

1112211122212121.content:
Soon the two reached Clark's apartment, and after unlocking the door, they walked inside. Lucy looked around and clearly wasn't impressed by the tiny space and the cheap decor. "Doesn't look like you've been doing too well since high school, Clark."

Clark's face turned red. A few months ago he'd been Superman, hero to the world, but now he was reduced to working for minimum wage at a burger joint and desperately trying to lose the flab that had encased his once-mighty body. "Well, I'm hoping things will pick up soon. If I could just lose a little weight, I'm sure things will turn around, Lucy."

She smiled. "Well, getting fit won't be a cure-all, Clark. I'm sure I can help you lose some of that belly, but it won't change what got you into this mess in the first place."

"Trust me, Lucy, I've learned my lesson." Clark knew once he was able to fit back into his Superman suit and regain his powers, he'd never give therm up again. For anything.

"Well, let's get started then. I need to assess your physical strength to begin. See what kind of a base I'm dealing with, OK?"

Clark nodded.

Lucy smiled. "So why don't you get up on the bed, big boy, and lay down. I'm going to tie your hands to the post, and I want to see if you can break free, OK?"

"What?" he exclaimed. "You can't be serious, Lucy?"

She turned to face him and took a step forward. "Look at my body, Clark, and then look at yours. I'm not just big and strong for a girl, I'm bigger and stronger than most guys on this planet. I can bench 300 pounds and squat 500, OK? I can do over 100 situps and chinups without breaking a sweat. I can run 5 miles and not even get winded. Can you do any of these things? Has this belly and those man-tits and that giant ass gotten any smaller in the last few months, or have they only gotten fatter, softer, and weaker?

Clark dropped his head, again ashamed. "Sorry, Lucy. Whatever you say." He then walked over and got into position on the bed.

"Good boy, Clark." Lucy then pulled a small strap out of her pocket and tied Clark's hand to a bedpost. "OK, now use all of your strength to try to break free."

Clark pulled and stretched as hard as he could, but it was no use. His flab jiggled and quivered while he struggled, but he could not break the strap and get his hands free. Any residual strength he had kept from when he gave up his powers had faded during the past few months, and he was as helpless as a kitten.

Lucy smiled again. "No strength at all, huh? No power left in those once big and muscular arms?"

"No, I guess not," replied Clark.

"Good."

Clark was puzzled. "What do you mean? Wouldn't it be better if I was a little bit stronger?"

"No, silly, I want you to be a weakling. I just had to make sure before I took it, so I could be confident you couldn't stop me."

Clark was still puzzled. "Take what?"

Lucy disappeared into the other room. She returned a few minutes later holding his Superman suit. "This!" she exclaimed.

Clark began to sweat. "Um, I can explain, Lucy."

"No need, Clark. I've known all about your secret identity for years. It wasn't too hard to figure out in high school...I mean, you had the best body in the class, and those glasses didn't fool me."

Clark's mouth fell open, but he didn't know what to say.

Lucy continued, as she dropped the suit on a nearby schair and began to take her shirt off, revealing a clingy lace bra that barely contained her enourmous tits. "Oh yeah, I knew. I loved watching you as Superboy back in high school - so much so, that I wanted to get big like you. I became obsessed with the idea of becoming a superstrong female warrior. So after I got to college I started fiddling around in the chem lab and came up with a formula to add some beef to my frame, and as you can see, I had a lot of success."

Clark gulped as Lucy flexed her giant biceps. Afterward, she put her arms down and started to take off her shorts.

"But, chemicals and hours in the gym could only take me so far. I got big, but not big enough. I wanted to be like you - superstrong! So I've been watching you pretty closely, Clark. I even installed a camera in your apartment just to make sure I didn't miss anything. I can't believe you gave up your powers just to get a little sex, but instead ended up a fat slob. And then, once I realized that your powers were being stored in this suit, well I just had to create an opportunity for me to put it on."

"Lucy, you can't. Please, I'm begging you - those are my powers! I need them back! If you put on the suit, I will stay like this forever! You can't leave me this way! Earth needs Superman!"

Lucy slipped into the supersuit as quickly as possible, then turned back to Clark as she fastened the belt around her taut waist. Instantly she began to grow, with he muscles bulging bigger and bigger every second. "Clark, she said...

"Clark. Good to meet you. Have a seat."
Clark reached out so shake the hand of his new employer, His fat fingers grasping the smaller hand.
"Thank you, sir."
Clark seated himself carefully on the smallish office chair next to the gleaming glass and chrome desk of his boss. He'd been expecting an older man, maybe 60 or so. This man was not yet 30, lean as a whippet and with a pretty, almost feminine e face.
"So tell me about yourself. What do you like to do in your spare time? I travel a lot but this place is where I need to recharge. I buy businesses and restructure them. It's stressfull so when I finish a turnaround I like to come back here where everything is idyllic. I need someone who can manage a farm, get his hands dirty when necessary but mostly just keep it all tidy and managed. I figured that growing up on a farm but looking at you in person, I'm wondering if I don't need someone trimmer. What do you weight anyhow? "
"No sir," Clark answered quickly. "I'm your man, Mr. Hogarth. I let things get a bit our of control last year when I got injured but I can handle anything you've got here. I'm working to lose some weight and get back in shape so some physical work is just what I need. "I'm around 290 (Clark figured that a skinny man probably wouldn't know the difference between 300 and 400 so he lied) but farm work and a healthy diet will change that."
"290? Hard to imagine. I weigh 130 soaking wet. Well, I guess time will tell if your the man for the job and call me Rob. Mr. Hogarth is my Dad- and a nasty customer he is. You can live in the pool house if you like. It's attached to the workout room and sauna. Or you can pick one of the bedrooms in the guest wind. Use the pool and gym all you want. I keep the place staffed. Mrs. Roberts , the housekeeper and cook will be happy to fix anything you want to eat. Drives her crazy that I don't eat much. I try to run this place like a small ranch. There are three riding houses, though they aren't built for someone your size. Cows in the back. I've got a large garden. I'll give you a tour and then let you get to work."

"Sorry, sir." Clark stopped shoveling and stood with his head down in a submissive position. He needed this job. "I was running late. There was way more shit than usual and I was hurrying to get down before lunch. I didn't know you'd be having visitors. I'll clean this up in no time."
Clark continued shoveling while Tob simmered. "It wouldn't hurt you to miss a meal. Well talk later." he said. "Bruce, let's get you cleaned up."
Clark kept his head down and shoveled. Then he hosed off the patio and cleaned his tools.
In the two months working on the farm, Clark had accomplished part of his goals. He had saved up a few bucks. Rob paid him pretty well and so long as he stayed on the farm there wasn't much he needed to buy, particularly when Cook had given him her husbands old clothes. They weren't stylish but they were big. At first they were a bit baggy but the combination of physical labor on the farm and the quality and quantity of food available were affecting Clark's body. He was developing some firm muscle in his arms, chest and legs. At the same time his gut had grown. This wasn't quite the way Clark had wnated things to go.Still a man's got to eat and Clark got damn hungry with all the farm work.

"You hungry, Clark?" Cook asked, grinning.
"Always." Clark grinned back, his resolve to cut back always disappeared when he saw the lunch spread. Cook seemed to think she was feeding a band of farmhands instead of just one. He didn't want to disappoint her and so far he hadn't. Fried chicken, mashed potatoes and gravy, creamed corn, hot buttered cornbread, sweet tea- Clark was all over it. Cook was really good. He dug into a peach cobbler, shoveling as fast as he could swallow and alternating with ice cream, thinking this was the life when he heard.

Clark nodded not knowing quite how to respond.

Rob had mixed feelings about the offer. On the one hand, it would bring Bruce around more often and give him an opportunity to see how much muscle the man was carrying. Might get something started with the big buy. On the other hand, he wasn't too pleased at Bruce spending time with his fat, bumbling farm hand.
Clark was conflicted too. On the one hand he could use the help getting back in shape but he really didn't want Bruce to find out that Superman had gone and ruined his life.
Clark thought for a moment then answered.

Clark started his first day at the firm and met his new assistant, Milo. Milo was young like Clark, in his early 20's, and had worked at the firm for several years without much success climbing the corporate ladder.

When he was first hired, Rob and the other executives thought he would be a big asset to the company: Milo had been a wrestler during high school and college, winning several national titles, and he came in as a very fit, 6'1" 180 athlete who looked great in a suit. It also didn't hurt that he had been quite handsome and charming during the interviews, and he seemed well-prepared with his degree in business management.

Milo was set up as an salesman for the company, which sold athletic equipment to gyms and fitness stores, and everything went well during his training. But left out on his own, Milo seemed to struggle making sales - he'd always been successful when paired with a good coach, but he couldn't quite figure out how to make things work once left to his own devices. He began to lose confidence quickly.

It also didn't help that once he gave up his wrestling routine, his amazing physique began to fade. The long, 3-martini lunches with clients took their toll, and as with many wrestlers whose metabolisms became screwed up due to their extreme dieting, Milo found that his belly and ass seem to explode in size after only a few months. And without making any sales and earning commissions to pay for new clothes, he still had to squeeze his bigger body into his smaller outfits, making them very ill-fitting and uncomfortable (which also didn't help him feel better about going to work).

So after a few months, Milo was transferred out of sales and into the marketing department, but he wasn't able to make any headway there either. It turned out his professors had been bullied by the wrestling coach into giving Milo better grades than he actually should have earned so that he could stay on the team, and he really wasn't that creative or bright.

Finally, Milo was demoted to an Assistant, and he had been scuttled from one executive to another, none of whom enjoyed working with him very much. He was friendly, but not particularly organized, and they needed someone who could keep on top of things for them.

His last stop was now working with the new guy, Clark. Apparently this guy was a good friend of Rob's, the owner, so Milo knew that he had to make a good impression or he would certainly be fired. He managed to get there early on Clark's first day, and he was going to do his best to make this guy like him.

111222.content:
“Sorry, no can do, Justin. I have an important meeting to go to at the science lab. Maybe next time, OK?”

Justin was disappointed, but set off for the cafeteria hoping to find another friend to join him. He did take a few glances back to check out Clark, however, whose taut body looked amazing encased in a tight red sweater and even tighter blue slacks.

Clark, who was also a senior at the college, could tell that Justin was checking him out, but he really didn’t have time to pursue that opportunity. He actually did have a meeting with the college science team, which ran one of the most respected and advanced labs in the country, but would be meeting with them as his superhero alter-ego.

As Superboy, he had become the most well-known of the junior heroes. He had foiled numerous crimes in the rural Midwest, and his exploits were becoming very well-known across the country.

The leaders of the Justice League of America were thrilled with his progress, but they did worry about his vulnerability to kryptonite, and the fact that this weakness was already so well-known to the world’s supervillians. Having that knowledge out there, along with the fact that remnants of meteorites from Krypton had scattered all around Earth, added some doubt to their prodigy’s bright future.

To ease this concern, they commissioned the university’s science team to work on a resolution to this problem and demanded that it be ready by the end of the year – the crimefighting organization wanted to announce that they were officially changing his name from Superboy to Superman during the Super Bowl, as well as tell the world that he was no longer adversely affected by rock fragments from his old planet. They had a whole publicity campaigned planned with the slogan: “We’ve taken the best and made him better.”

After running through many tests, the science team had finally achieved a breakthrough. Using DNA from strands of the Kryptonian’s hair, they had created a formula that halted the effects of kryptonite. They contacted the Justice League, and they in turn told Clark he needed to get over to the lab pronto. It was for that reason Clark had to turn down Justin, so he headed into his apartment, changed into his supersuit, and flew off to meet the science team.

Superboy arrived at the lab and the scientists got down to business right away. One of them asked if he would be comfortable disrobing in front of the team, or if he would rather use the privacy screen. “We can have one person accompany you behind the screen and set up, or we can all work together and it will go a lot faster.”

Even though his modesty almost overruled his decision, Superboy was very eager to see if their formula would work. “Let’s just get started out here – nothing us guys haven’t all seen before, right?”

The hero quickly stripped off his supersuit and stood there in his birthday suit – he was wrong about one thing, however, because most of the team had never gazed upon such a marvelous physique (except for online). It was a site that many of the small, frail geeks would consider to be the highlight of their year.

The scientists escorted the hero to a clinician’s chair, where he took a seat, and they began to attach special wireless super-electrodes to measure the test results. As they did so, several of them took a few extra seconds to admire the size of Superboy’s biceps, the hardness of his abs, and the power of his bulging thighs.

Ray Zane, the captain of the Science Team, kept the best assignment for himself – to attach the electrode to Superman’s cock. He picked up the super-rod gently in his tiny hand, immediately noting its size and heft – it was as thick as a big hose and felt like it weighed as much as a 20-pound dumbbell (which was about the weight that Ray could bench press). The scientist continued to act professionally while affixing the electrode, but he was struggling to overcome erotic thoughts of a night between the sheets with the studly hero.

After setting everything up, the formula was brought over to the chair and Superboy drank it down. The blue creamy liquid coursed down his throat, dissolved in his stomach, and entered into his bloodstream within a few minutes. Ray then had his assistants bring out a variety of Kryptonite fragments, exposing them to Superboy one at a time – the ubiquitous green, the power-zapping red, as well as a host of other samples that had been gathered from across the globe.

During the exposures, the team noted that all the electrode readings remained steady, showing no evidence of any decline or change in physicality. Superboy watched as they gave each other a series of thumbs-ups and high-fives, and then confirmed for them that he felt no weakness of tingling as the different samples were paraded into the room.

Once the last piece had been brought in, the scientists detached the electrodes and had Superboy put his supersuit back on (although most would have preferred he stay naked) so he could demonstrate his powers, starting with flight and continuing through superhearing, X-Ray vision, heat vision, superbreath, flight, and invincibility. As they had predicted, he passed each test with flying colors.

Finally, it came time for superstrength. They walked Superboy over to a squat rack, which he knew had been modified to test the muscle potency of Justice League members. The teen took his spot under the bar and prepared to lift.

“What are you going to set the weight for, Ray?”

“Well, Superboy, you squatted 10,000 pounds last time, so we estimate that you should be able to handle at least 12,000 pound by now. Or would you rather warm up first?”

Superboy nodded. “It’s been a year since my last test, and since I’ve gotten a lot stronger in the past few months, let’s start with 12.”

“Will do.” Ray turned the dial to increase the setting. “Ready when you are.”

Superboy placed his hands on the bar, and then hoisted it upward off the rack on his back. He slowly began to squat, thrusting his chest forward and moving his hips backward as he had been instructed during previous test sessions. As he did so, he could instantly feel a burning in his back and thighs that was more intense than he had ever felt.

“Great Scott,” he thought. “This one’s a whopper.”

Superboy slowly descended until he reached the nadir of the squat, with his knees parallel to the floor. Due to the amount of exertion, sweat began to pour from his brow and a tremble became evident across his body.

“We can suspend it at any second, Superboy. Just give us the word.”

“Not a chance, Ray. I can do this,” he grunted as a reply.

The Last Son of Krypton pushed upward for about 15 seconds, but the weight didn’t budge, so he redoubled his efforts and focused his superbrain on the task at hand. “Wow,” he thought. “This bar is really heavy.”

He continued straining with all of his might, but began to realize that things were moving in the wrong direction. Instead of going up, the barbell was sinking a tiny bit with each passing second. Sweat was now cascading over his eyebrows and clouding his vision, and he could sense that his breathing was stressed.

“Why is this so difficult?” Superboy asked himself as recent crimefighting adventures flashed in his mind – episodes in which he had stopped bad guys by hoisting their cars in the air, helped keep aircraft up in the air, and uprooted trees. “This should be so easy!”

He gave one last push, concentrating all of his power into his already-numb legs. He didn’t hold back one ounce of his superstrength and gave it his all. And that’s when everything went black.

Sometime later, Superboy awoke back in the clinician’s chair where the scientist’s had tested him earlier. “What happened?” he asked as he came out of his fog.

The scientists were quiet at first, but Ray finally spoke. “Well, Superboy, it looks like we ran into a few complications with the formula. Our best guess is that the solution not only blocked your weakness to Kryptonite, but also blocked your strength from refueling. The harder you pushed, the more of your muscle was drained away until, um, your well ran dry.”

Superboy felt nothing but pain coursing through his body, and he put his hand on head for comfort. “That’s happened before though, Ray. All I need is exposure to Earth’s yellow sun to recharge, right?”

“We tried that while you were out, Superboy – we opened the ceiling hatch and sat you directly in the sunshine, but that didn’t revive you and it didn’t raise your strength level.”

The teen hero looked down and noticed that his costume had been taken off again and the wireless electrodes had been re-attached. “So…so what happens now?”

Ray handed Superboy a cup of water. “Well, we'll try a few more thing now that you are awake, and of course we'll keep working on the formula until we get it right. And as for your current condition, well....

1112221.content:
Superboy almost choked on his water. “Powers? I’ve lost all of them?”

“You know how it works,” replied Ray. “Your strength is the engine that drives all of your other powers. Without it, everything else lies dormant.”

“So how long until you develop the antidote?” asked Superboy, slumping his shoulders as he spoke.

“Hard to say – our goal was to have the chemicals bind themselves to your body. We wanted to create something that would last a long time so you wouldn’t have to drink it every day. We will study the results of your tests to see if we can determine where it settled and how we can neutralize it. It’s also possible we weren’t successful and it may drain from your body naturally – one good bowel movement and you might be as good as new.”

The Kryptonian sighed, and then stood up. He wobbled a little, and several of the scientists reached out to help steady him.

“Let us finish the final tests and we'll get you dressed, Superboy,” said Ray. “I promise we will contact the Justice League the moment we come up with something.”

Clark sighed again, then sat back down on the chair - just the act of standing up had tired him, and he was glad for the chance to rest while the science team did their work.

Later, when it was dark, he walked home after borrowing a long coat from one of the scientists to cover up his costume. Clark sat by the phone for the entire evening waiting for a call, but one never came. He wanted to skip school the next day, but decided to attend his classes and act as if everything was OK, but the world seemed so different to him – slower, quieter, less vivid, and flatter – without his superpowers.

Of all of his powers, the depletion of his strength was by far the most annoying loss for Clark – everything was just so much heavier and unwieldy (even something as little as his lunch tray) and he became winded after just a short walk. His muscles looked just as big as they did the day before, but there was no power or force behind them – they were like empty shells. His biceps still increased in size when Clark flexed, for example, but the muscles were very soft when he touched them and could easily be squeezed. The rock hardness that was there before was no longer.

To make things worse, his muscle control was also affected. He was used to confidently gliding through the campus and avoiding any obstacles, but was now walking awkwardly and stumbling from time to time. As winter began to set in, the snow and ice on the ground outside also made it difficult for him to get around, so he began to walk very slowly and carefully wherever he went to make sure he didn’t fall and hurt himself.

In addition to these complications, he was also starting to gain weight at a rapid rate. Clark had never relied on food to supply his nutrients before, so he had never been much of an eater – he would just consume whatever necessary to blend in with non-superheroes. But since his fateful day at the science lab, he found himself to be just as famished as any other young man, and he started eating bigger and bigger meals and snacked constantly throughout the day to satisfy his hunger.

But the test fomula had also robbed him of his super-metabolism – in fact, His was left slower than that of a normal guy – so Clark’s body started to quickly register some changes. His once super pecs began to sag ever so slightly, and his ridged abdominals no longer showed up under the layer of fat that had accumulated on his belly. His once-perfect ass had begun to spread wider and wider, and love handles had sprung from nowhere to attach themselves to his side.

Of course, the weight gain was very difficult for Clark to hide in his tailored clothes. What had once fit perfectly was straining to cover him, and by early December he could no longer wear his regular pants or shirts. He had take the bus the Big and Tall outlet shop to pick up some sweatsuits that would fit his growing bulk.

The other students certainly noticed the changes, but most were too kind to say anything – they just avoided saying anything about the transformation and tried not to laugh at unfortunate events like his pants splitting open as he sat down due. Some of the more cruel ones, however, started calling him “Clark Spent,” and unfortunately he could hear their whispers and giggles even without his superhearing.

He tried to remain upbeat, but as the days stretched on without a call from the science team, Clark became more and more withdrawn – he felt pathetic and weak, and hated that he could no longer contribute as a crimefighter. He only left the apartment to go to school, he rarely spoke to anyone, and he stopped paying attention to the world around him. He was growing as gray and cold as the weather.

By the last Saturday in January, just as he was about to give up hope, Clark's life changed again when he....

11122211.content:
Clark watched the commercial for the gym and thought, “I guess working out won’t be so bad,” he said. “And it probably would take my mind off of things.”

He walked over to the gym later that morning, where the attendant at the front desk signed him up for a membership. “There are three trainers here right now, sir, so you can have your pick,” he said as he pointed to the workout area. “Just look for the people in the yellow shirts.”

Clark walked over to the workout area and immediately spotted the first trainer in a small office just off the gym floor – he was a little older, maybe 30, and had the look of an ex-football player with big muscles and a big gut that were stretching out his yellow shirt. He looked tough and powerful, and exuded a real manly confidence.

“Option #1,” thought Clark. “He’s got the same body type as me, so he definitely wouldn’t be able to deride me for my weight gain.”

He scanned the room further and noted a second yellow shirt, this time being worn by a man approximately 25 years old with lean build. The man was incredibly good-looking – silky black hair, smoldering blue eyes, flawless skin, and a dazzler of a smile that caused Clark to swoon a little. It was as if God had taken the best features of Clark Gable, Paul Newman, and George Clooney, and then combined them with the body of Ryan Gosling.

“Well, he’s an excellent Option #2.”

Clark continued to walk around the gym until he noticed a third yellow shirt – it was being worn by a youthful muscular blond guy who was doing wide-grip chin-ups. Suspended five feet in the air with his arms outreached, wearing the yellow t-shirt over radiant skin and crowned with golden hair, the trainer resembled a glowing angel. His biceps were insanely big for someone so young-looking, and they didn’t seem to require much effort to propel his beefy body up and down, up and down, on the chin-up bar. Clearly this person needed to strap on about 100 extra pounds to really challenge himself.

“Wow, so that’s Option #3. I don’t think I could go wrong with any of them,” he thought.

111222113.content:
Clark decided to go with Option #3, the young blond trainer. He walked over to get a closer look at the stud.

As Clark approached, he noted that the skintight yellow shirt revealed a set of sturdy-looking set of delts and traps, a beefy chest, and a pair of wing-like lats that added to his angelic appearance. The shirt was also a little short (or was all that muscle preventing it from covering the trainer’s whole torso?), so his finely-sculpted abs were peaking through. Below the shirt, he was wearing a baggy pair of athletic shorts that hid the definition in his upper legs, but Clark was reasonably sure they were probably as strong-looking as his calves.

The trainer seemed to notice the staring, so he jumped down and walked over to Clark. “Can I help you, sir?” he asked in a polite tone.

The golden hues grew brighter as the well-muscled trainer approached, and Clark felt a wave of tingling stirring his senses – it was as if he had suddenly woken up from a long nap and no longer resided in the gray world he had been living in for the past few months. He felt really alive for the first time since his powers had been drained.

The former hero cleared his throat and stood up as erect as he could. “Um, I just signed up for one of your training packages, and the guy at the front desk said I should come out here and meet the trainers.”

“Great. Would you like me to introduce you to everyone so you can find the one right for you?” asked the trainer. He rubbed his left hand over his buzzcut hair, causing his bicep to bulge up again – and up close, it looked even larger than it had on the chinup bar.

“After seeing how easily you do those chin-ups, I have a feeling you’re the right person for the job,” Clark replied with a big smile on his face. Then he reached out his right hand and added, “I’m Clark, by the way.”

“Very nice to meet you, Clark,” said the trainer as he firmly gripped the hand of his new client. “My name is Griffin, but everyone just calls me Griff.”

The two men headed off to the training office to discuss Clark’s new regimen, and Griff had a huge smile plastered on his face. He was thrilled that someone had asked to work with him – he had just started at the gym and was not nearly as experienced as the other trainers, so he hadn’t signed up many people yet.

He was also excited about the possibility of spending time with Clark. In the past few months, Griff had been noticing other guys more and more – their bodies, their movements, their faces – and he often daydreamed about getting closer to them physically. Just last week, after seeing a photo of Superboy in the newspaper article about his mysterious disappearance, he wondered what it might be like to kiss someone so handsome and with all that muscle.

When they settled in the office, Griff handed Clark a few forms to fill out – and as he did so, he stared across the table at his new client and checked off all the attributes he found appealing.

Dark hair. Check. What I wouldn’t give to run my fingers through it…

Blue eyes. Check. I could get really lost staring into them…

Strong, determined jaw. Check. So masculine…

Dimples. Check. Like little perfectly formed canyons on his cheeks…

Tall. Check. At least 6’0, maybe even 6’1”…

Husky build. Check. That well-fed Midwestern look was really working for him…

“I just hope he is as nice as he is cute,” thought Griff. “If he’s conceited or stubborn, it could make for some very long sessions.”

After finishing the paperwork, Griff asked Clark about his fitness goals. “So what would you like to accomplish here at the gym?”

Clark seemed to think about his answer for a few second and then responded. “I knew the question would be coming, and I had planned to say something about getting into better shape and losing some weight. But seriously, after seeing you on the chin-up bar, I want to go all the way. I want to look like you, Griff.”

Griff pulled up his shirt bottom to reveal his cobblestone midsection and the bottom half of his beefy pecs. The fabric grew tighter as it rose upward and clung tightly to his chest – so much so that when he dropped his hand, the shirt stayed up.

“Well, I tell you, Clark, I worked pretty hard for this body. And we can get you there, too, but it’s going to take some effort. There’s no magic formula that’s going to get you there. You’ll need to do a lot of work.”

Clark smiled and nodded. “I’m ready. Just show me what to do.”

“OK, then, let’s go.” Griff pulled his shirt back down and they headed into the gym.

Griff put his new client though a rigorous workout, showing him all the exercises for his complete routine. By the end of the hour Clark was completely winded, but at the same time upbeat at the thought of seeing Griff again a few days later.

As the weeks went by, Clark grew stronger and stronger under his trainer’s tutelage. He was able to lift more and more with each session, and Griff could see the changes on his physique. What was once lumpy and unformed was becoming burlier and well-developed as Clark’s muscles slowly seemed to inflate all across his body.

Griff especially liked to watch Clark do squats – he wasn’t sure it was the extra amount of effort that his client seemed to put into that particular lift, or if it was just the thrusting motion of his hips, but Griff would practically get a hard-on every time they approached the rack and he pictured Clark pushing the bar up and down with his legs. And when it came time to spot his client, he was very worried that Clark would accidentally back up and get lanced by his massive erection.

“Thank goodness for my clipboard and my baggy workout shorts so I can hide it until it goes away,” Griff thought.

As Clark’s fitness level improved and the weather became warmer, Griff began incorporating some outside activities into the routine. Instead of always meeting at the gym, they would sometimes take long jogs through the campus and do pull-ups and push-ups wherever possible.

On one Sunday afternoon, a late spring storm suddenly moved in and a torrential rain began to fall as they were out jogging. They quickly decided to change their plans and head indoors to watch a movie at Griff’s house while they waited the rain to stop.

“Before we start the movie, however, let’s toss our stuff in the dryer. No need to sit around in wet clothes, right?” Griff asked as he took off his t-shirt and athletic shorts, leaving only his boxers and socks on.

“OK,” replied Clark. He quickly slipped off his shirt and shorts, also leaving just his socks and boxers on. He body has changed considerably in the last few months, and although he was no longer in super-shape, he had regained quite a bit of his muscularity.

Griff put the clothes in the dryer, turned on the TV and DVD player, slipped in the movie, and both boys took a seat on the sofa. The credits started up a few moments later and they turned their attention to the screen.

About 30 minutes into the film…

1112221132.content:
About 30 minutes into the film, Clark noticed Griff staring at him. “What’s going on?” he asked. “Why do you keep looking over at me?”

Griff smiled. “You’re looking really fit these days, Clark. I’m glad you decided to stick with the exercise program.”

Clark returned the smile. “Well, you are an excellent trainer, Griff.”

“Yeah, but a lot of the other people I train at the gym give up so easily – they hardly put any effort into their lift, and then they complain I am overtraining them. But you – you give it your all, even when I know you must be hurting.”

Clark smiled. “Thanks for noticing. I’ve tried to work really hard.”

“And you have! You’ve made so much progress since you started.”

“Do you think? I guess I’ve gotten a little stronger.”

“Clark, I don’t think – I know,” replied Griff as he grabbed Clark’s arm and flexed it for him, causing a bulge in his biceps. “These pythons must be stronger than a locomotive by now.”

“They have gotten a little bigger,” agreed Clark.

“Stop being so modest. Your arms are way bigger, your chest is bigger, your legs are bigger. The only thing that’s gotten smaller is your waist.”

Now it was Clark’s turn to blush. “Well, your body definitely made me want to get bigger and stronger.”

Griff disagreed, and leaned in a little closer to Clark’s face. “I don’t think so, Clark. I think deep down inside you knew you could be great.”

As Griff spoke, Clark could feel his friend’s breath on his face. He took off his glasses, set them aside, and turned back to his friend. “You’re right – I did wish to be. Man, you’ve paid closer attention than I thought.”

“It’s because I really cared about…cared about…you…reaching your goals.”

They stared at each other, with neither saying a word for almost a minute. It was as if time had stopped in the room, and not a sound came from within the walls.

Finally, almost imperceptibly, Clark gave a very slight nod. Upon seeing the movement, Griff slowly and carefully reached up and put his hand on the side of Clark’s head and gently began to stroke his friend’s hair. “It’s because I really cared about you.”

Clark put his hands around Griff’s neck and gradually pulled him closer. “Oh, Griff, I’ve wanted to do this for such a long time.”

"I've never met your brother in real life, but I'm starting to dislike that douchebag." Brooke sneered.

"I try to not let it bother me." He shrugged, "Anyway, I do want to get fit, but the pressure of being Patrick's brother and the shame made it hard for me to even muster up the courage to set foot in a gym."

Brooke nodded in understanding. He didn't want to bore her with his own problems, but it felt nice to talk about them with someone else. His brother was hardly someone who was interested in emotional talk.

"And what if I helped you out?" The muscular redhead in front of him said all of a sudden, "We could work out together. I'm no professional trainer by any means, but I know enough to help you get big. Well, in a different way than you are right now."

He blinked in amazement and awe, "You'd do that for me?"

"Sure!" Brooke smiled brightly, placing her hands on her wide hips, making her shoulders look wider than they already were, "But let me ask you something first. Why do you want to get muscular?"

"Ah, well, I suppose I'm tired of being in Patrick's shadow. People always refer to me as his fat twin brother, and look at me as if I'm worth less. I know I'll never be his size or catch up to him, but I want to try my hardest." He then added sheepishly, "Also, I hope it will give me a better chance at finding a girl who is interested in me."

His new friend chuckled heartily, "Sounds great! You know what? I think this is going to work out great. In fact, there's an option that promises results faster than just working out."

"You mean steroids?" Justin asked in confusion.

"No, you dolt. We don't need that stuff." She rolled her eyes in good humor, "No, what I meant is that there's this new genetic research project in the science wing of this campus. They're trying to come up with a muscle enhancer, and I got a job as an intern there. I could get you one as well, if you'd like. We're supposed to start testing in two days, but we could use a second volunteer."

Genetic research? Justin had heard of such things before, and it wasn't the first time for public testing to take place at their campus. Well, if Brooke said that it would help, who was he to say no?

"Sure! I'd love to." He told her, agreeing to be an intern.

Her grin widened, "Great! We'll go together tomorrow so I can introduce you. Just you wait, Justin, this is going to be an amazing partnership!"

.....

Justin nervously walked into the laboratory, both terrified and in awe of the scientific equipment that looked incredibly expensive. Brooke was the opposite; she walked through the door with confident strides, her defined calves bulging with each step.

"And here's where the magic happens!" She smiled. The internship was a go, and now it was the day of reckoning, "Are you as excited as I am?"

"I guess... Honestly, I'm more nervous than anything else."

Brooke chuckled, "It's alright, Justin. They told us the procedure is perfectly safe."

"Indeed it is." Came a feminine voice to their left. Standing amidst the lab equipment was a woman in her forties, with blonde hair and green eyes behind elegant glasses. She wore a white labcoat over her well-endowed body, "Hello, my name is Claire Devos, but please just call me Claire or doctor Devos. I will be performing the experiment with you today."

"So what are we going to do?" Justin asked out of curiosity.

In response, the woman gestured towards two tubes at the end of the room, "Both of you will get in your respective pods. Once you're all settled in, we'll start exposing you to a new procedure of ours that will enhance your muscles on a cellular level. It will be easier for you to gain muscles mass, as well as lose fat. There might be additional enhancements, but we'll see after a few days of observation."

"Should we get inside?" Brooke asked, excited for their upcoming experience.

Claire smiled, "Whenever you're ready."

And thus it was with an anxious but determined mind that Justin walked into the pod, ready to change his life.
11132.title: Justin applies for a paid internship

choices: They grow even more
Justin confronts Patrick
The couple returns to the lab
111321.content:
It had been two months since Justin decided to do the internship together with Brooke. To be perfectly honest, he had been terrified to participate in the genetic experiment. After all, what if something went wrong? He didn't want to end up with cancer or something like that.

When he had started the internship, he had weighed around 225 lbs of fat. People would stare at him, though not positively, due to the weight he carried with him.

Two months.

The plan that they had been given by dr Devos was a busy one; they would spend at least four hours a day working out, and the exercise was carefully followed up by lots of food and additional treatments. Luckily it was all free.

Two months.

Brooke was a perfect partner to work out with. She was supportive, understanding, kind and simply amazing. Hell, he even developed feelings for the beautiful muscle girl, and just a month ago he had confessed to her. Justin was still amazed that Brooke and he were now a couple.

Two months.

That's all it took to turn all of his fat into solid muscle.

Justin inhaled deeply, causing his massive chest to swell up. Pectorals the size of book covers jutted out a good few inches of his torso, like armored plates that had a deep line running between both pecs. The tank top that he was wearing was getting way too tight again.

With the necessary oxygen filling his lungs, Justin lifted the barbell for the twentieth time, forcing the 400 lbs into the air. His arms bulged with dense muscle fibers, from his vascular forearms to his grapefruit-sized biceps, all the way up to his boulder-like shoulders.

Justin grinned as he put the bar away and stood up from the bench. His body had gone through a major transformation during those two months alone. As it turned out, his bodyfat was a great source for the treatment as his body turned all of that fat into energy that he could use to bulk up.

And hell, he had bulked up a lot!

There was very little fat on his frame now, meaning that his shredded muscles made up a lot of his weight. Justin smiled as he flexed a bicep that measured at a good 19 inches. A thick vein throbbed angrily, trailing to his defined triceps.

He could see his magnificent lower body in the mirror of the private gym that came with the internship, and he would be lying if he said he didn't enjoy the view. Gone was his flabby belly; there was a solid wall of muscle now, made out of dense abs shaped like bricks. His eight-pack had a breathtaking definition to them that put many others to shame.

Even his legs were incredibly muscular now. His quads were thick and wide, while his hamstrings were like ropes of steel. Each leg bulged with immense muscle mass that was proportionally sized to his teardrop-shaped calves.

He'd even grown a few inches taller as well somehow. A side effect of the treatment as it turned out, putting him at an astounding 6'5".

In fact, he'd grown somewhere else too...

That internship was really working out for them.

"Mhm, I like it when you have that air of confidence around you." A sultry voice spoke up from behind.

Justin almost had a heart attack as he turned around in surprise, facing the feminine voice of his girlfriend. Had he really been that focused on his own progress that he hadn't seen or heard her coming up from behind?

She chuckled in amusement, "Wow, that surprised to see me? I've been here for over an hour too, you know. And here I thought my boyfriend would like to see me in action."

"Ah, sorry, I was distracted." He apologized immediately.

Well, it wasn't as if he didn't like watching her work out. Hell, it was the highlight of his day, watching her herculean body push itself even further.

Brooke had definitely profited from the genetic treatment as well.

Whereas he had managed to turn his fat into muscle and stay around the same weight, she had eclipsed not just him, but any other bodybuilder in the business that he knew of.

His lovely girlfriend was now a mind-boggling 6'8" and 322 lbs.

While his muscles were by no means small, they were nothing compared to the ever flexing muscle mass of Brooke. Her shoulders were wide enough for a grown man to sit on one of them and have room to spare, while her striated back represented a labyrinth of muscle cords; capable of supporting her breasts.

Because yes, another side effect appeared to be her expanded breasts, now a J-cup that stood proudly on top of thick pectoral muscles. It was insane; her luscious form trailed down to a narrow waist made out of hard obliques and abs, then flared out to wide hips that were connected to a huge muscle butt.

Brooke's arms were sledgehammers of untold strength. Her biceps alone were 26 inches! Needless to say, the rest of her arms equally swelled with immense muscle mass. Then there were her legs. Gods, those legs... They were so long, yet so packed with strong muscle. Her thighs constantly rubbed against each other due to their sheer size and muscularity. The girl's calves were bigger than two fists pushed against each other.

Thick veins crisscrossed over the expanse of her skin as they fed more blood to her already pumped muscles. This woman before him was a titan, capable of astounding feats of strength, possessing a luscious feminine form with hundreds of pounds of dense muscle.

"Mhm, I can see that." Brooke smiled appreciatively as she gazed at his own muscular form, "You were kinda cute before, but you've definitely gotten a lot more handsome. Nice abs."

Justin grinned, "Still nothing compared to you though."

"True, but let's be honest; no can compare themselves to me."

And with that, the red-haired beauty flexed a single arm, making it erupt like a volcano. A mighty mountain of muscle rose in the air, her bicep's peak reaching an amazing height. Brooke's arm was well-defined as every bit of muscle mass was highlighted. Thick veins pulsed as she maintained the casual flex, which was already much more impressive than any bodybuilder could produce.

"Fair enough. Damn, your bicep has gotten really big." Justin whistled in approval.

Brooke grinned, showing her pearly white teeth, "Glad to hear it. There's nothing better than growing huge than doing it while your boyfriend drools all over your body. Play your cards right and I'll let you oil up this bad boy."

Now how was he supposed to not get aroused by that?!

"You know, I never expected results like these." Justin remarked, "Only two months have passed, and instead of being the fat brother of Patrick, I've become his equal and taller. I've even scored the most muscular girlfriend of all time."

"It's alright, Justin. Honestly, I'm a bit overwhelmed myself." Brooke responded gently, before giving him a devious look, "Speaking of overwhelmed, how about I show you a new trick of mine?"

The tall amazon slowly walked over to a nearby stack of weights, swaying her wide hips and drawing attention to her firm glutes. That muscular butt really was a work of art. And the way her humongous thighs bulged with muscle...

Brooke reached out and grabbed a weight for doing bicep curls. However, this was no ordinary weight; Justin's jaw dropped as his girlfriend held 100 lbs in just one hand.

"Watch this." She winked at him.

Then she began curling the weight, showing no sign of having trouble whatsoever. Hell, it looked as if she was doing it effortlessly! Brooke easily curled the massive weight, her defined bicep tensing and expanding to the size of a cannonball of pure might.

The display was more than erotic for Justin. He stared hungrily at his girlfriend, watching her handle the weight that even a pro would struggle with, while she was doing more than 20 reps now without stopping.

"Always nice to pump my arms!" She laughed loudly, displaying her titan-like power.

And all of this in just two months. This internship was getting better and better all the time!

1132.content:
Patrick pushes Justin towards the weights. Justin seemed out of his element.

“Come on bro! It’s easy.” said Patrick.

He picks up two very heavy weights and starts lifting them.

“Uhh... give me a second, I need to go to the washroom.” said Justin.

He rapidly walks toward the bathroom. He opens the sink and splashes his faces with water. A man enters the washroom and sees Justin.

“Hey dude, you alright” the man said.

Justin turns around and sees a built man looking at him. He looks like Patrick but he isn’t as big.

“Yeah... I’m fine.” replied Justin.

“I saw what happened over there, i thought I could help.”

“I don’t think you can. I just... sometimes I wish like I was like him. He is so strong and he gets all the attention. I get attention too but, not the positive kind. Thanks for checking on me though.”

“Wait!” replied the stranger. “I think I can help you.”

“How?”

He digs into his pockets and pulls out a small box.

“Swallow half of them and give the rest to Patrick.”

“What is this?”

“It’s what I used to get bigger. I don’t need it anymore. I hope it will make you happy.”

The man leaves the washroom. Justin is left alone in the bathroom with the pills in his hands. He counts them all and splits the amount in half. He swallows half the pills and drinks water from the sink.

“What if these pills are going to kill me?” Thought Justin. “Well... it’s too late anyway.”

Justin goes to see Patrick again.

“Are you alright? Said Patrick covered in sweat.

“I’m fine, I’m just a bit worried. I don’t want people to judge me.”

“Who cares what they think, I’m going to go to the bathroom too. When I come back, I want you to be lifting some weights.”

Patrick runs off to the bathroom. Justin takes the time to put all the pills in Patricks’s water bottle. He shakes it as much as he can and puts it back where it was. Justin decided to start off with the treadmill. He hops on the treadmill and starts jogging. He wasn’t used to running, it was very energy draining. Patrick comes back and gives Justin a pat on the back.

“Nice job! Keep it up!” Said Patrick

Patrick hops onto the treadmill next to Justin and starts running. He put the speed much higher then Justin. They both have been jogging for about 15 minutes. Both covered in sweat, they take a break. Patrick takes a big sip out of his water bottle. By big sip I mean he chugged the whole bottle.

“I’m really proud of you Justin” said Patrick

“Thanks bro! That means a lot to me.”

The two brothers started to feel a bit dizzy.

“Wow!” Patrick said as he sat onto the floor.

Justin did as well. The dizziness dissipated a few minutes later. The two got up.

“Now that I feel a better, wanna hit the weights?” asked Justin.

“Of course.” replied Patrick as he gave Justin a pat on the belly, but he noticed something. It didn’t feel the same.

“Justin?” Asked Patrick

“What?” Replied Justin as he turned around.

Patrick lifts Justin’s shirt. It did in fact look different.

“What the hell? How did you lose all that weight?

Justin looked down and realized his belly looked different. He went towards the scale to see his weight. He now weighs 200 pounds, which is 25 pounds less then usual. Justin realized the pills were working. He didn’t want the effect to go to waste.

“It doesn’t matter let’s keep working out.” said Justin

Patrick was shocked but he also wanted to workout. Patrick does his full body workout and Justin follows with ease. About an hour and a half later, the brothers sit down on the floor, covered and sweat, to catch their breath.

“I have never felt this good after a workout before in my life!” Yelled Patrick

“It does feel good.” Replied Justin.

Patrick gets up and offers Justin a hand to get up. He accepts it and gets up. Something felt off. They started to walk toward the exit but Patrick’s felt like his clothes were much tighter then before. He looked over to Justin and it seems to be the same thing for him. He passes in front of a mirror. Patrick was shocked. It looked way bigger then before. His tank top, covered in sweat, was stretching to it’s limits. Patrick always buy shirts that are too big so he can grow into them but the shirt he was wearing was brand new and it looked too small already. His very well developed 6 pack became an even more developed 8 pack. His built arms and shoulder swelled up even more and his chest felt bigger. His shorts were tight, that is probably because of those huge quads that he now has. Patrick touches his body with a feeling of arousal but he was still shocked. How did this happen? Justin finally realized how big Patrick now is.

“Look at me Justin! I’m huge!”

Patrick redirects his path to the scale and steps on it.

“I’m 265 pounds! I gained 40 pounds of muscle in a single workout!”

Patrick returns to the mirror and starts flexing every muscle of his body. Justin passes through the mirror and realized he changed as well. His big belly was no more. He lifted his shirt to see a slightly defined 6 pack. He also looked at the rest of his body. No more fat. He jumps on the scale. It indicates 170 pounds, all muscle. Justin was so happy, he couldn’t even hold in his happiness.

The brothers return to their homes. They both locked each other in different bathrooms to admire their bodies.

1133132321111.content:
Gabe wasn't too sure about how the whole revenge via IRS audit was going to work, but he agreed to the deal. Persuasion promised to provide him with bi-weekly updates on how the process of wrecking the lives of Eric and Patrick was going.

----------

Exactly two weeks later, Gabe woke up to find an email in his in-box with the subject line reading "Persuasion Update."

He clicked to open it, and inside there was a a short note that read "Status Report #1 for Gabe" and a link. He clicked on the link, and his web browser popped open to a site with a video, which began playing after a few seconds.

The title caption read "Pro Body Supplements, Lincoln Street" and was dated two days ago. Gabe watched closely as the video rolled, and he quickly surmised it was from a security camera inside the store. At the counter he could see a sales clerk wearing a Pro Body t-shirt waiting on customers. The clerk was young, maybe around 19-20, medium height, and had a fit but lean frame. He smiled and chatted with the customers as they bought their protein powders and energy bars.

About 5 minutes in, all the customers had been rung up and left, the door to the shop opened again. In walked Eric and Patrick, who looked as huge as he had a few weeks back when Gabe saw him at the gym, and he was showing off his body in a white tank top and insanely tight blue athletic shorts. As they wandered through the store, Eric couldn't help put touch, caress, and grab his lover's bulging muscles, and he followed up the heavy petting with phrases like "You look so fuckin' hot, babe" or a "I cannot believe how huge you are, Patrick."

Patrick grabbed all the supplements he needed and dumped them off at the front counter, then pulled out his wallet and handed the clerk his credit card. The clerk tried several times to ring things up, but each time Patrick's card was denied. The bodybuilder was becoming angrier with each passing minute, so he whipped out his cell phone and called the credit card company. While doing so, Eric chatted with the clerk and apologized for Patrick's outburst, saying that "He gets crabby when he doesn't have his supplements."

A few minutes later, Patrick hung up and broke the bad news to his boyfriend. "Apparently, I'm being audited by the IRS and all my accounts have been frozen. Can you pay for these, Eric?"

Eric smiled and pulled out his wallet. "Of course, stud. Anything to make you bigger." But Eric soon was faced with the same problem - his credit cards were also denied, and after a couple of phone calls, he found out he was being audited as well and was cut off from his funds.

Patrick went ballistic. "What the fuck am I supposed to do with no money? How am I going to pay for my protein...or my gym membership? Fuck me, I got a contest coming up, Eric! I need to prepare for it! This body didn't get to be perfect without a little preparation, you know!"

Eric began talking calmly to Patrick and assured him that it must be some sort of mix-up and they would get everything straightened out. They left all of the powders sitting on the counter for the clerk to re-shelve and slowly walked out the door.

Ten seconds later, the video ended and Gabe realized he had a massive erection. He smiled knowing that his revenge was beginning to take hold.

Patrick decided to go up to his room and unpack, but then he heard footsteps coming up the porch and opened the door to see who it was.

Just ascending the last porch step was Lee, one of the postmen for the neighborhood. He was fairly tall, about the same height as Patrick, with broad shoulders and a tight waist left over from his glory days as a high school athlete. He had dark brown hair, which he liked to keep short, and dark brown eyes, and he actually looked quite striking in his uniform.

When Patrick opened the door in his thogh white shirt, the sight took Lee’s breath away. The bulging biceps and triceps, the big meaty pecs, and those unbelievable abs, all topped off with the golden hair and deep blue eyes.

“Hey there, Lee,” said Patrick. “It’s been a while. Wasn’t sure when I would see you again.”

“Hello, Patrick, and here you go” responded Lee while handing the bodybuilder his mail.

“Thanks. How’s the route going today?”

“It’s been pretty light, as usual. Not much being sent this time of the year.”

Patrick smiled. "It must be nice getting paid and getting all this exercise, out in the sunshine, with the fresh air, and no traffic to get stuck in."

Lee nodded. "It's pretty much perfect for me. I even like it when it rains."

“Cool. Well, thanks again, Lee. See you next time, Lee."

Lee tried to think of something to continue the conversation, but he didn’t want to seem like he was too desperate. He gave a quick wave and started back down the steps, wondering if he should start sending mail to Patrick anonymously, just so he would have something to deliver each day.

Patrick was about to shut the door when he had a thought. “Hey, Lee,” he called out. “Do you like to play basketball?”

Lee immediately stopped on the steps and turned around. “I’m always up for a game. Why do you ask?”

Patrick walked out on to the porch to finish the conversation. “I just sort of felt like playing a little ball tonight. You wanna meet me at the court by the high school tonight for a little one-on-one?” He mimed a basketball shot as he spoke.

When Patrick jumped, Lee watched as his pecs bounced up and down. "Well, I tried using your gym, but it was so dank and dark in the basement that Justin and I thought it would be better to have the equipment up here - the lighting is so much better, plus we added in the stereo, and it's way more convenient." Sarah picked up her barbell and started curling it again.

"Well, once we sold the furniture to make room, Justin said I could use the cash to buy some more weight. I needed for for my squats and deadlifts. Like I told you before, these muscles aren't just for show."

He ignored her taunt. "Regardless, don't you think you should have asked me first?"

"Well, you did say the your house was my house, right? Make myself at home?"

"Yes, but...listen, I don't have to explain myself. I demand that you and Justin put everything back the way it was."

Sarah stopped curling and put the barbell down on its rack. 131111122.content:
Josh went home and entered his bedroom. He was only 20 years old and spent so much time on his struggling bodybuilding career that he didn't have a job, so he still lived with his parents. He locked the door behind him so he wouldn't be disturbed.

"Time to try on my new outfit," Josh said to himself.

He took off his clothes to reveal his muscled physique. Josh had been a top wrestler in high school and continued lifting afterward, always trying to make his body better. But he had hit a plateau about six months ago, and no supplements or change in workout helped to add any mass. He was stuck at 200 pounds and was afraid he would never win anything but very small local bodybuilding contests.

His agent, however, really believed in Josh and thought he could really be a champion if he could just add another 25 to 50 pounds of muscle, and he was frustrated that his client kept placing second to Patrick Bigg. So he hatched this scheme to steal Patrick's prize-winning body.

Josh agreed that Patrick needed to be taken down a peg, so here he was about to go through with it. He put on Patrick's t-shirt and shorts, both of which were too big, and then recited the spell exactly as Bob had told him.

He started to feel tingly and could feel his muscles growing, so he hurried to the scale to check his weight.

"210 pounds! Hot damn!" exclaimed Josh as he flexed his full and pumped biceps and checked them our in the mirror. Bob told him once the spell was cast, he should sap away 10 pounds of muscles a day for a week, and sure enough it worked. He then took off Patrick's workout clothes, tossed them in the garbage can in his bedroom, and redressed in his own so he could go back to the gym and start showing off his newfound strength.

-------------------------------

At the same moment, Patrick Bigg felt a little weak and leaned against the counter in his bathroom for support. As he did so, he thought his physique looked thinner. He immediately ignored the dizziness and focused on his toned body. "Getting nice and ripped for my next contest," he thought.

131111122212.content:
Josh's father, Chester Heftiman, used to be quite the gifted athlete when he was in high school. He had been on the football, wrestling, and baseball teams, and loved to do anything that involved physical activity.

Chester also loved to lift weights when he was in high school, not only because it helped him become a better athlete, but also because it helped him to build a nicely muscled physique that drove all the girls crazy with desire.

He had big bulging arms for hitting home runs, a sturdy pair of legs for running down the football field, and a tight set of abs that gave him a strong core to defeat other wrestlers.

But the body part that Chester was most proud of was his chest. He would spend hours doing bench presses and flyes to build up his mighty pecs, and he loved to flex and roll them while wearing a skin tight polo shirt. By the time he was a senior, his juicy muscle tits stuck out a good 4 inches from his rib cage, and many times people had 'accidentally' brushed up against him to cop a feel.

One of the most forward students to show her admiration of Chester's body was a girl named Cindy. She was the head cheerleader and aggressively pursued him romantically, and they soon became the power couple of the high school.

Unfortunately, their glory days did not last for long. Chester got Cindy pregnant right out of high school, so he dropped out of college and get a job so he could support his new family. The two got married soon after and a couple of more kids soon followed after their first, a son they named Josh.

The years went by and the responsibility of working a full time job and raising three kids took its toll on Chester's once magnificent body. He no longer had time to work out or eat balanced meals, so his muscles atrophied and flab started to pile on. Even worse, his superhuman chest began to sag and turned into two giant mushy moobs which Chester couldn't hide even in the loosest of shirts. He used to love it when people called him Chesty and grab a handful of his rock hard pecs, but now he was incredibly embarrassed when his old friends did it and would laugh as his titties jiggled.

Chester did love his family and the life that he had, but sometimes he did wonder what it would be like if he hadn't gotten Cindy pregnant...would he have been able to make it as a pro athlete? Would he still have a great body? Would his pecs still be big and hard?

It was just a fantasy, but he wanted to make it more real. After hitting 280 pounds and being told by his doctor to get into better shape, Chester went into his oldest son's room to see if he had any XXXL workout clothes he could borrow so he could start lifting again. His son Josh wasn't that big, but Chester knew sometimes he wore his clothes a little baggy.

Upon entering, he saw the t-shirt nd athletic shorts sitting on top of the wastebasket and picked them up. They looked bigger than what Josh normally wore, so Chester thought they might fit. For a moment he wondered if he should take the clothes without asking, but he really did want to start working our right away.

What did Chester do?

Rob returned home carrying two extra-large pizzas under his arm. He really wasn't the hungry, but he ate more out of loneliness and frustration than he did because his stomach was grumbling.

He put the pizzas down on the kitchen counter and dug in immediately. The momentary thrill he got from tasting the pepperoni and the cheese allowed him to temporarily forget that he was alone, pushing 40 years old, and really out-of-shape. The scale this morning had screamed 300 pounds at him, but Rob pretended like it didn't matter as he gobbled down slice after slice.

Later that night, he awoke in his recliner, not quite remembering when he had sat down. There were 10 pizza crusts on a paper plate balanced atop his giant gut, and not wanting them to go to waste, he finished them off before getting up.

He stumbled down the hall toward his bedroom, and stopped when he got to the trophy display in the corner. There sat all of his trophies, serving as reminders of his past as a fit, athletic winner. He had indeed been in Chester's shadow during high school - although a decent athlete, Chester had the perfect body and was able to win all of the girls. Rob didn't give up on lifting right after school, however, so while Chester piled on the pounds during his 20's and 30's, Rob went on to add 50 pounds of muscle to his frame and started winning local and regional bodybuilding competitions. All of those contests gave him a bunch of trophies, plus the award he had been most proud of: Best Abs, which we had earned during a Mr. Hunk contest 10 years ago. Rob always struggled with his mid-section, which kept him from making into the big leagues of bodybuilding, but that one day they were absolutely perfect and the judges rewarded him for it.

Success in bodybuilding had led to a few other endeavors, including a fitness video and some endorsement deals, but nothing really that brought him fame and fortune - just a little security and a lot of women who like well-muscled guys. He ended up marrying one of them, but she left a few years later for a younger stud and took most of Rob's money with her.

So now here he was, staring at all the trophies, but Rob could really only see the reflection of himself in the glass, and he focused on the double chin, the sagging moobs, and the fat belly. "What happened to the guy I used to be," he thought. "What happened to the guy who won best abs in the Mr. Hunk contest?"

Rob staggered off to bed and slept soundly that night. when he awoke, he decided it was time to stop feeling sorry for himself and start trying to make thing better.

Regardless, Zach was growing really quickly, and Hank figured there wasn't much time before the new stud took over as the absolute biggest guy in the school. Hank, having the locker next to Zach, couldn't resist swiping and hiding the bag in his car.

Brad pulled over and hopped out of his car, feeling the heft of his bouncing gut and ballooning ass. He threw open the door and hurried inside so he wouldn't be late for his workout. "Hello!" he bellowed as he entered. "Anyone here?"

A big-boned and very tall woman slowly emerged from the shadows. She had black hair, a dark complexion, and was wearing a black lace dress that reminded Brad of something Stevie Nicks might have worn in an early 80's Fleetwood Mac video. "Greetings, sir. I am Madame Elsa. How may I help you?"

Brad walked up closer to the woman, annoyed that she moved about as fast as a snail and talked just as slowly. "Your sign says remedies. You got something for weight loss."

Elsa smiled, again very slowly. "Why, of course, sir. Why don't you tell me about your problem?"

The tone of Brad's voice grew darker. "What the hell does that matter? Look, you got any diet pills or not?"

"Of course, but there are different ones for different people. I need to know all about you so I can make sure you get the right ones."

"Fuck, I don't have time for all that," replied Brad. "I gotta get to the gym."

He turned quickly to leave, but he still wasn't used to the size of his growing belly, which sloshed as he moved and hit a display case. The items on the case fell onto the floor, and although it appeared that none of them broke, Brad did snag his shirt on the corner of the case and tore off a button. "Fuck fuck fuck!" Brad hollered. "I just bought this shirt! Goddamn it!" And without saying a word to the woman, he huffed out of the door with his exposed gut bouncing as he walked.

Elsa, still smiling, closed her eyes and said a few words in her native Romanian. She wanted to teach the man a lesson, so she cursed him - and that curse was....
