1313112232.content:
Tate wanted to talk to Patrick, but he was too shy and too afraid to do so, so he just got up from his chair and went back home.

Back when he had been in elementary school, Tate liked spend his free time outside playing sports and games. He loved to jump into a casual game of touch football or stickball whenever he had the chance.

Once he got into middle school, however, sports became more competitive and his friends started to get bigger and beefier. Suddenly every boy in the neighborhood was sprouting muscles and challenging one another to arm-wrestling competitions or to see who could do the most pushups.

But Tate’s body didn’t respond the way his friends’ did – although he was definitely getting taller, he was also getting skinnier. By the time he entered high school, he was just under six feet tall and weighed only 100 pounds.

Tate tried out for the freshman football team, but was cut after the first week – he had great instincts and could easily follow the plays, but his gaunt body was just not strong enough to match up with the other boys. So the coach pulled him aside on Friday afternoon, told him the bad news, and encouraged him to try a non-contact sport like cross country.

He took the news hard and retreated to his room for the entire next weekend. He went to school the following Monday, certain that everyone was mocking him behind his back, and kept his head down for most of the day.

His funk continued well into the next year – Tate stopped going over to his friend’s houses, stopped hanging out at the mall with the other kids, and stopped watching sports on TV. Nothing seemed to motivate him anymore, and this lack of interest in anything, including meals, only made him lose more weight.

His mother – who by that time had been widowed for five years – was becoming worried that something might be really wrong with her son, especially since he wouldn’t confide his feelings to her. So she asked her younger brother, Matthew, to come over for the holiday to see if a male perspective could help, and he was more than willing to give it a try.

He arrived shortly before dinner and took off his coat to reveal his hulking frame. At 6’4” and 320 pounds, Matthew Mueller was a man who clearly knew his way around a weight room and a dinner table. He wasn’t fat (and he wasn’t lean either), but he was definitely a big man with big muscles.

He was wearing a skin-tight University of Kansas t-shirt that showed off every ripple in his corn-fed torso, especially his massively muscular pecs that stuck out about six inches from the rest of him. His biceps were so huge that one might have thought he stuffed two bowling balls up his sleeves, and his neck was roughly the same diameter as a large Frisbee.

Down below was more of the same, with huge legs that stretched the denim of his jeans so tight that a quick squat might be all it took to burst them apart. On his feet were a custom-made pair of size 17 shoes, the largest size anyone in the Mueller family had ever known.

The rest of his features only added to his masculinity – he had a high and tight buzzcut, dark brown eyes, a pug nose, a slightly crooked smile, and a heavy jawline. Add in the massive size of his hands, and he was definitely the last person that anyone would want to challenge to a fight.

His sister hugged him after he hung up his coat and then stood on her tiptoes to give him a quick peck on the cheek. She looked up at his dark brown hair and said, “When are you going to get a little gray up there, Matty. I’ve been fighting it for years and your hair is still as dark as the day you came home from the hospital.”

“Hey, I’m not even 30 yet. I hope it’ll be a few more years before I start looking like Dad.”

Tate’s mother smiled and told her brother to go on up, so he ascended the stairs to the second floor. Matthew reached his nephew’s bedroom and rapped softly on the door. “Hey, Tate, can I come in?”

This time, instead of turning away the older friend, Tate agreed. “Sure, I guess.”

Matthew walked into the darkened room and saw Tate slumped across his bed and staring at the ceiling.

“Hey, buddy, how are you doing?” asked Matthew as he crossed the room and sat down on the bed next to his nephew. “Your mom says you’ve been having a tough time lately.”

Tate looked away from the ceiling over at his uncle – they had always talked a lot in the past, but Tate only had to take a quick glance at his uncle’s immense bulk and know that he could not possibly comprehend what he was going through.

“So what’s going on, sport?”

“You wouldn’t understand, Uncle Matt.”

“Try me. Is it girl trouble?”

“No,” replied Tate while rolling his eyes.

“Bully trouble?”

“No.”

“Body stuff?”

Tate’s sat up and shot a stern glance at his uncle. “What do you mean?” he asked crossly.

His uncle put his hand on his back and patted it gently. “I didn’t mean to get you riled up, Tate. I just meant that a boy’s body goes through a lot of changes when he hits your age, and I just wanted to see if you had any questions.”

Tate looked back down again and muttered something that his uncle could not hear. “What did you say?” asked Matthew.

“Why am I such a wimp?”

His uncle smiled that they were making some progress, and then assured his nephew that he wasn’t a wimp. Within a few minutes, and after some additional probing questions, Tate unleashed the waterworks and started bawling. He told his uncle the story about being cut from the football team, and how the whole thing made him feel ashamed that he was so scrawny and worthless.

Matthew let his nephew finish his crying, gave him a hug, and reassured him that he was not worthless. “You mean so much to your mom, and to me, and your grandparents. We all love you so much and couldn’t imagine our lives without you in it. And I know it isn’t easy for you right now, but trust me when I say you will get past it. In a few years, when you are scoring touchdowns and hitting homeruns, you’re not even going to remember this little blip on your road to success.

Tate wiped the tears from his eyes and looked over at his uncle. “How could you know how I feel? You’re like the biggest guy on the planet.”

Matthew laughed, and then pulled out his billfold from the back pocket of his jeans. He flipped to a picture of a young adult with long brown hair, a scraggly beard, and the skinniest body that Tate had seen outside of his own. “Do you know who this is, Tate?”

“No. Is he a friend of yours, Uncle Matt?”

“Tate, believe it or not, that’s me during the summer after I graduated high school. I was 18 years old and weighed not much more than you do now.”

“What?” cried Tate as he sat up on his bed and pulled the photo closer. He examined it for a good 30 seconds before he could finally see some similarity around the eyes. “You’re so thin!”

“Yeah, I was one skinny mofo. Kids use to joke that if it hadn’t been for my giant feet and big ass clown shoes, I would have blown away in a stiff wind. I was rejected by every single sports team I tried out for in high school, so I know exactly how you are feeling.”

“Seriously?”

“Yes, seriously – I probably wasn’t even strong enough to make the chess team. Now let me show you something else.” Matthew flipped to another picture in his billfold – this one was clearly him a few years later, with his flattop in place, no more beard, and standing shirtless on a beach. He had muscles all over his body and was smiling like he was having the time of his life.

“Wow, Uncle Matt, how much later is this one?”

“Two years later – that’s the summer after my sophomore year of college.”

“Two years!” exclaimed Tate incredulously. “How did you do it?”

Matthew smiled and began his tale. His transformation had started when he arrived on his college campus the fall after leaving high school. He had fallen madly in lust with a girl named Chloe who he would see every day in the cafeteria at lunchtime.

“She had long red hair, big blue eyes, a rockin’ bod, a throaty laugh, and you could just tell she could show you a good time. Man, I tell you, she was something else,” he said wistfully.

Tate giggled.

“I desperately wanted her to notice me, but my buddies told me that Chloe only had eyes for the guys on the football team – big muscles were her thing. She wouldn’t give you the time of day if your biceps weren’t bulging.”

“So you started working out?”

“Exactly. I was fed up with being a virg…um, rather, fed up with being single, so I decided it was time to change my luck and change my body. I went straight to the campus gym and signed up.”

“Were you the smallest one there?” asked Tate.

“Well, I wasn’t the shortest, but I sure was the skinniest. I wouldn’t even change in the locker room because I didn’t want people to see how skinny I was. I just wore my stinky clothes back to the dorm and changed in private.”

“You were embarrassed around the bigger guys?”

“At first, sure. Who wouldn’t be? The guys at the gym were pretty big. But I went in there and did my thing every day, and you know what I found out?”

“What?”

“Those guys in the gym all started as little guys, too. They knew what it was like to be a beginning lifter, and they were all very supportive. I ended up making a lot of new friends.”

“So you liked lifting?”

His uncle answered...

And after a few weeks I started seeing some changes in the way my body looked, and I just wanted more, more, more.”

Tate smiled at the direction the story was going.

Matthew continued telling his nephew about his new life at college – how he started eating everything in sight because he was hungry all the time, and how he had gained 20 pounds of muscle by the time he returned home for Christmas break. He also doubled the amount of time he spent in the gym during winter quarter because he was addicted to his growth.

“Every minute I wasn’t in class or studying or eating, I was at that gym – I started working out twice a day and hitting everything hard and heavy. By the time I got home for Spring Break, I had put on another 30 pounds of muscle. I was getting so big so fast – it was as if my body had been waiting all that time to grow and just needed a spark. I had arrived on campus at 120 pounds in September and weighed 170 pounds by March.”

“Did a lot of people notice?”

“Oh, I made sure they noticed. I squeezed my new muscles into the tightest clothing I could find. I was constantly coming up with new ways to show off, whether it was flexing my biceps or picking up the heaviest object I could find. A couple of times I even flexed so hard that my shirt sleeves just burst right open, and I can tell you, everyone notices that!”

“Cool!”

“It was indeed, Tate. Well, except your Grandpa and Grandma didn’t always think it was cool – they had to send me more and more money so I could afford all that food I was eating, plus I was going through a lot of clothes. I went from a small to a medium to a large to an extra large so quick, I think they were afraid I was going to bankrupt them buying new shirts all the time.”

The thought of wearing an extra large shirt was beyond comprehension to Tate, but he guessed that his uncle probably wore a triple-X or quadruple-X sized shirt by now.

“Anyway, I kept working out all though Spring Quarter and finished the school year at 200 pounds. I wasn’t huge yet, but I was getting to be pretty buff, and I loved all the veins that started popping up across my chest and arms.”

“Did you work out over the summer, too?”

“Like a maniac! Grandpa wanted me to get a job at his store, but I begged him to let me spend the summer lifting weights instead. I guess he was encouraged by the progress I had made during the school year because not only did he agree, but he also paid for the gym membership himself. So I got up every morning that summer and rode my bike down to the Tipton Gym and pumped as much iron as I could. My whole life during those three months revolved around getting stronger and growing bigger, and I ended up gaining another 30 pounds of beef.”

“So, 20, 30, 30, and another 30? You gained 110 pounds in one year?”

“Scout’s honor. My body just exploded with size.”

“You must have been quite a sight!”

“I sure thought so! I didn’t have a full-length mirror, so I used to strip down to my shorts, sneak into your mom’s room, and pose in front of her mirror when she was out. I loved to flex my arms, my chest, my legs – everything!”

“Did she ever catch you?” asked Tate.

“Nope, I was too sneaky. But she did catch me measuring my biceps one time and said I was becoming way more vain than any girl she ever knew.”

“You measured yourself?”

“Of course – I had to see how big I was getting. It was so awesome to know that my arms went from 10 inches to 18 inches, and my chest exploded from a 33 to a 48. I was really proud of my pecs, too – they grew really big and firm, and I used to make them bounce up and down while wearing a tight shirt just to see who would stop and stare.”

“Did people really stare?” asked Tate, who himself was having a hard time not fixating on the two giant boulders that stuck out from his uncle’s chest.

“Constantly – I was such a show off! Some folks would ask me to flex for them, too, and I was more than happy to oblige. I’d just roll up my sleeve and give them a show – heck, most of the time that summer I wasn’t even wearing a shirt because I was still outgrowing them so fast! Eventually, the guys at the gym told me I should shorten my last name from Mueller to Mule because I was getting to be as big as one.”

“Matt the Mule. That’s really awesome!”

“Well, just The Mule. The nickname sort of stuck, and to this day people still call me that.”

“So Mule, did you ever get your shot with Chloe?”

Matthew laughed. “Well, I tell you, I shaved off the scraggly beard and buzzed my hair over the summer so I would look more like a jock. And when school started up again in September, I walked into the cafeteria on the first day wearing a sleeveless muscle shirt and a tight pair of athletic shorts. I even cut the bottom off of the shirt so she couldn’t miss my abs – I figure that I had worked so hard on them I might as well make sure she could get her fingers on them without trying too hard.”

“And?” asked Tate with bated breath.

“Well, I think everybody else thought I was crazy because this freak cold spell moved in and it was only 40 degrees that day – but Chloe sure liked what she saw! Within one minute of catching sight of me she started caressing my biceps and complimenting me on how big they were. Within two minutes she was stroking my abs and telling me how hard they were. Within three minutes, she was patting my musclebutt, and within four minutes, we were kissing. By minute five, she said she was ready for an afternoon of fun. So I scooped her up in my big arms and carried her all the way back to my dorm room.”

“You took her to your dorm for a date?”

Matthew realized he went a little far, so he covered as best he could. “Just to change clothes before our date – remember, it was really cold that day.

“Gotcha,” replied Tate. “So did you guys go out for a long time?”

“You know, we didn’t. We really didn’t have anything in common except our mutual attraction, so we never had anything to talk about after our, um, dates. The whole thing flamed out pretty quickly.”

“So once you broke up with her, did you take a break from working out?”

Oh, no. I had been bitten by the weightlifting bug and there was no going back. I got so big that I joined the football team, and I’ve been hitting the gym regularly ever since.”

“So you still like it as much?”

“More than you can imagine. I like the way I look and feel with this body. I like being the ‘big guy,’ and it’s helped me at work, too. You know the company I work for – we have lots of employees but only a few managers. Everybody wants to be a manager because they get the big salaries, the big bonuses, and all the perks. But the thing is, it’s the managers who meet with the clients, so managers need to have a certain image – they have to be strong, with an air of authority, and be able to project confidence to the clients. And trust me, I know it was these muscles that got me the promotion and made me the youngest manager in the history of the company.”

“That’s awesome, Uncle Matt!”

“Hell, yeah, it is. I don’t think I’d be able to afford all my food and supplements without that salary I earn now. Plus I wouldn’t have my fancy new truck either. And trust me, Tate, when you get older I’ll tell you a few other great things about being the ‘big guy.’ But your mom would probably skin me alive if I told you when you were only 14.”

Tate giggled again, and then took another look at the picture of his uncle on the beach, and then flipped it back to the picture of him with the long hair and the beard. “You think I could get big like you?”

Matthew smiled and then tousled his nephew’s hair. “Well, you’re half Mueller, so I’m pretty sure you’ve got a good chance. That’s why I wanted to talk to you – would you like to start working out with me? See if we can take you from stick to stud?”

“Seriously?” asked Tate, his mouth hanging open after he said the word.

“Yes indeed, kid. My last partner just moved away so I need someone to work out with me. But only if you’re serious about getting big.”

“I’m ready. I want to be HUGE!”

“That’s the spirit! But there’s one condition you have to agree to.”

“There’s lot of great things about being a big guy, but you can’t ever let it go to your head. You’ve got to promise me never to let your big muscles make you think you’ve got the right to take advantage of or bully others, OK? Just because you can win a fight doesn’t mean you’ve got to go looking for one.”

“I promise, Uncle Matt.”

“Good, because if I ever hear otherwise, I will track you down and give your ass a whooping like you wouldn’t believe.”

“You’ll never have to. I know what it’s like to be the little guy, and I promise to never forget. I’ll be the best ‘big guy’ you’ve ever seen.”

Garret smiled at his uncle.

We’re gonna need all the protein we can get for our big workout tomorrow.” Matthew reached up his left arm and flexed it for his nephew, who watched in awe as the gigantic bicep inflated and threatened to tear right through the shirt sleeve.

Six months after Tate Archer started training with his uncle, he was now 15, a sophomore, and definitely not going to get cut from the football team. The coach had practically fainted when he saw Tate’s new and improved body on the first day of tryouts, and he had made him parade around shirtless in front of the squad to show them what a great off-season conditioning program could accomplish.

The other players may have been surprised at Tate’s new physique, but Molly Hartwell, the yearbook photographer, was astonished. She remembered seeing Tate the year before – he was gangly, awkward, and thin as a rail. But today she took one look at him, with his close-cropped blond hair, chiseled face, and athletic physique, and immediately decided to get some pictures for her ‘personal’ portfolio.

As soon as the coach let Tate finish showing his strength to the team, she sauntered over to him.

“Tate, you sure have grown. I seem to recall you were just a little twig of a boy last year, but you somehow turned into a mighty oak,” she said while staring at his taut pecs and six-pack abs.

Tate blushed at her comments. “Hi, Molly,” he said softly.

Molly moved in a bit closer so that he would have to see her long brown hair and soft brown eyes. “So how did you get so big?”

“I’ve been working out with my uncle,” he said, looking back up at her face.

“He must be quite a trainer if he could pack all this beef on you.”

“Yeah, he’s pretty big. And really smart, too.”

“I’ll bet he is. So how about letting me snap some photos of the new you for the yearbook?”

“OK. You want me to put my shirt back on?”

“Oh, no, that’s not necessary. Um, I mean, it's probably all wrinkled by now.”

“Well, where do you want me to stand?” he asked as he looked around the gym. “By the bleachers?”

Molly put her finger to her lips and pretended to think about her answer, even though she knew exactly where to go for some privacy. “Let’s go over into the workout room. The coach is still getting everyone registered, so we have plenty of time before tryouts begin.”

Tate agreed and accompanied Molly to the weight room – he tossed his shirt on the floor and waited as she readied her camera. After making a few adjustments, she asked him to pose while holding a pair of 50 pound dumbbells, which he picked up and lifted over his head with ease. He stood as erect as possible, stuck his chest forward, and smiled as she took photo after photo.

“Very nice, Tate. Now maybe we could get one on the chinup bar.”

“Sure thing.” He set down the weights, jumped up, and effortlessly pulled his head up over the bar. Again, he smiled, and again, the camera clicked away.

Corbin was thinking he was insane; there was no way that he could be getting bigger. But his thoughts were confirmed as he watched the seams of his large jeans snap open, one by one, as Dale's fat flesh poked through.

Dale snapped his head around, his cheeks already larger and fuller than they were before he had turned his back to Corbin. He yelped as he saw what was happening to him, and placed a beefy hand on a patch of skin pouring out of his torn jeans. The touch alone sent slow, thick ripples through the rest of his swelling butt, which was enough to free the rest of his lower half from the confined of his pants, which fell to the floor around his thick calves. His shirt was ripping too, his large belly sagging two feet out from his chest, down to his knees.

Dale stopped growing then, showing more flesh than that hidden under his underwear and shirt. He poked his massive belly with one hand, and sighed as he looked down at his new flabby form. He pulled his tattered pants off of his feet and slowly waddled to his "fat guy" chair, his body undulating with each step. He sighed laboriously, wiping some sweat off his brow. Corbin just stood there, gawking at the massive change Dale's body just underwent. He looked like he had gained more than a hundred pounds.

Dale just looked down at his flabby stomach, and whispered...
14112222.title: Undesired results

choices: "Has made me a lot stronger!"
"Actually is turning into muscle!"
141122221.content:
Dale just looked down at his flabby stomach, and whispered, "I look so fuckin' disgusting..."

Corbin rushed over to comfort his friend. "Dale, I am so sorry! I'm not sure what went wrong. I promise you that I double-checked everything before I left that lab, and this formula should have made you stronger, not fatter.

Dale was on the verge of tears as he shook his belly and watched it quiver. "How am I going to explain all this fat to my dad? He was already on my case for how I looked before, but when he sees me like this, he'll probably disown me."

"Dale, I swear I will fix it. I'll come up with something, no matter how long it takes, I will fix it."

"I don't want any more of your help, Corbin. I don't want...I don't...I don't feel so right."

Corbin wasn't sure how to proceed. "What do you mean? What else is wrong?"

"My body is tingling all over," said Dale.

"Are you getting dizzy or lightheaded?"

"No, just tingly....I feel very odd."

"I'm going to call 9-1-1...just hang in there, buddy."

Corbin turned to run to the phone, but Dale grabbed his arm and shouted, "Wait! Help me up first."

"Dale, I think you should keep sitting. Standing may make it worse."

Dale smiled and practically jumped out of the chair, causing his flab to ripple all over. Then he said, "I think all of this new fat..."
141122221.title: "I look so fuckin' disgusting..."

1411222211.content:
"What? What do you mean, it's made you stronger?" asked Corbin, perplexed.

"Where are your weights?" asked Dale. "I just need to check whether I'm right or not. It feels a bit easier to stand now, so something must be up..."

Corbin reluctantly brought Dale to his weight room down in his basement. Corbin flicked on the light, illuminating the room with pale fluorescent light. Dale headed down the stairs, his flabby body jiggling as he sat himself down on the bench. Although it creaked a bit, it was still able to hold him at his larger weight.

"Let's start with 100," suggested Dale. Corbin loaded each side of the barbell with fifty pounds, and spotted Dale as he somehow was able to lift it with ease, even though he looked like he was too fat to even stand up for a long period of time.

After 25 reps, Dale asked Corbin to add more weight, and by the time Dale finally ran out of energy around ten minutes later, he was benching a full 200 pounds.

"Woah..." said Corbin. He was absolutely dumbfounded that his new strength had come from fat alone. He could find no way to describe it, other than as a medical marvel.

Dale just sighed, wiping some sweat off his brow. "Wow... Corbin?"

"What is it?" Corbin asked.

Dale said:

14113.content:
Justin was very wary of taking part in such an experiment, but the thought of becoming a muscle stud without having to really work at it was very appealing. He looked down at his bulging belly and asked, "How about we fatten you up, Corbin, and you can take the formula?"

Corbin hesitated before he had responded. He hadn't really thought of it before, knowing that his high metabolism prevented him from gaining weight, but as soon as Justin spoke, Cordin started to daydream about what it would be like to be super huge.

Justin waited for his friend to respond, but eventually gave up and said, "Earth to Corbin...you there?"

Corbin shook off his fantasy for the moment, and then said, "Um...no...I don't gain weight. This process wouldn't work for me. But you may have given me a better idea, Justin. Thanks!"

And with that, the little guy ran off, with Justin standing there wondering what he had said.

Corbin had a new idea. This time he wasn't going to figure out how to transform muscle into fat, but rather he would....

choices: Corbin goes through with the plan to take Wyatt's muscle
Corbin breaks contact with Wyatt, but stays in the bed with him
Corbin runs from the store
141131.content:
A few months later and Corbin had a whole new plan - he was going to take muscle from someone for his own body! His conversation with Justin had stirred something deep inside of him, and he now knew all of the experimentation he had done on muscle growth was because he wanted it for himself. He wanted to be the big guy, not just be around other big guys.

So Corbin perfected his solution, and figured out it would work only if two things were to happen: he would have to drink the formula, and then the first person he touched for two minutes continuously would lose muscle to him. If he broke contact in that two minutes, the transfer would not work.

The science nerd thought about who he would take the muscle from, but he knew he had to be careful - it would have to be from a stranger, someone who didn't know him and wouldn't be able to find him after the transformation and seek revenge.

So Corbin drove 90 miles away to another town, and he went to the mall to seek out big guys. He figured if he looked in the Big N Tall section of a clothing store, he might find some Big N Tall men he could use as victims, as long as those men were attracted to skiiny, nerdy types.

Corbin parked his car and entered the mall through Sears, figuring he could start at one of the bigger stores. He wandered into the general clothing area, but couldn't find the men's section in what appeared to be a very deserted store. Corbin was in the midst of his search when he came across a salesman approaching from a nearby fitting area.

The salesman was young, probably not more than a few years older than Corbin, with sandy hair and a rugged, brawny physique. His thickset torso had been poured into a light green polo shirt that accentuated every well-fed muscle, especially the twin boulders that were his pecs, which rose and fell and rose and fell as he walked. Corbin became mesmerized by the bouncing beef, but eventually pretended as though he was looking at the man's nametag, which was perched atop his massive chest. It read, "Wyatt / Assistant Manager."

As he returned to the station, the manager looked over at Corbin and politely asked, "May I help you, sir?"

Corbin looked up from his lingering glance at Wyatt's musclebound chest and replied, "Yeah, I'm looking for men's clothing. And sorry, I didn’t mean to stare.”

Wyatt winked and then said, “No need to apologize, sir. It’s always nice to be appreciated for all the hard work I put in at the gym. And as far as men’s clothes go, I'd be glad to show you." Wyatt turned and headed toward the back of the store, down an aisle that Corbin had not previously seen. As they walked, Corbin looked down to see that Wyatt's lower half was also as tightly packed into his black slacks as his upper half was packed into the polo shirt.

"Here we are," said Wyatt, pointing out the men's clothing section with his entire hand. "Please let me know if you need any further assistance. I’m about to go on break, but I’ll be just behind the counter in the employee break room if you need….anything.”

“Oh, I don’t want to disturb you on break.”

Wyatt winked again. “You wouldn’t be disturbing me, I promise. I’m the only one on duty in this department, so I’m available for whatever you need.”

"Thank you," said Corbin. He watched as Wyatt walked over to a nearby register station and disappeared behind it.

“That’s perfect,” thought Corbin. He waited a few minutes to see if anyone else would come in, but the store remained deserted, so he drank the formula down, very much hoping that the studly salesman was really interested in him and not just trying to up his commission.

Corbin headed toward the register station and walked into the employee break room, where Wyatt was sitting in a big chair reading a bodybuilding magazine. “Hey buddy, you need me for something? You find anything you want to slip into?”

The science nerd did his best to flirt. "Yeah, I was just hoping to check out your big ol' body again. You look really nice."

“Thanks,” said Wyatt. He set down the magazine, stood up, and puffed up his chest. “I have been working really hard lately at getting bigger. I’m so huge that most of my clothes don’t fit anymore.”

“I can see that,” said Corbin as he eyed Wyatt’s bulging pecs. “You look pretty big all over.”

“I appreciate you noticing. I’m really proud of this body. Too bad my boyfriend doesn’t like it. He doesn’t understand my desire to grow.” When he said the word ‘grow,’ Wyatt hit a quick double bicep pose as he sauntered forward, and his bulky arms responded by blowing up in size.

“He doesn’t?”

“No, he says I’ve gotten too big for him – can you believe that? He preferred it when I was smaller and weaker,” said Wyatt.

“Really?” asked Corbin incredulously.

“Yep. I mean, do I seem too big to you?” Wyatt was now only about a foot away, so close that Corbin could smell his musky cologne.

“Um…” Corbin hesitated, feeling a little flushed. “When did it get so hot in here? Did the air conditioning break?” he thought.

“Please, I’d like to know,” said the muscleman. “You won’t hurt my feelings.”

“I think, um..."

“Maybe this will help you answer,” said Wyatt as he smiled slyly, and then slipped his polo shirt over his head and tossed it on the floor. His brawny torso was smooth and tanned, and he clearly had spent many hours growing his muscles. He wasn’t ripped like a bodybuilder, but rather looked like someone who enjoyed spending lots of time in the weight room but very little time on the jogging track.

Corbin was lost in his thought when Wyatt reached up and gently took Corbin’s wrists in his hands, and then Corbin suddenly remembered that he needed to not break contact for two minutes for the transfer to take place. “Here, feel my pecs. Do they seem too big?” He then placed Corbin’s open palms on his flexed chest, right over his pert nipples.

The heat Corbin felt grew tenfold when he made contact with Wyatt’s hulking body. The steel-hard muscles didn’t budge as he squeezed – rather it was Corbin’s hands that contoured to them. “No, they’re perfect. All I have to do is touch them to know how hard you’ve worked.”

Wyatt’s smile grew even bigger. “Thank you.” He relaxed his pose and let Corbin’s hands dig in to his chest muscles. Sweat was now beginning to pour off Corbin’s brow, but he couldn’t remove his hands from Wyatt’s body and wipe it away.

Wyatt continued to let Corbin play with pecs for about 30 seconds before he felt his arms needed some attention. “Check out my pythons – do they seem too big?” He flexed his biceps again, and up close they looked even larger than a minute ago.

Corbin moved his hands from Wyatt’s expansive chest to his mountainous arms – they were as hard as his pecs and radiated raw strength and power. “Wow,” he said with a slightly glazed look in his eyes as he fondled Wyatt’s biceps. “Very manly. I don’t know how any guy’s arms could be too big.”

“Exactly,” agreed Wyatt. “I mean, I’ve always thought that big arms were the ultimate symbol of masculinity.”

“I’m certainly glad to be hanging on to them,” replied Corbin slowly. I’m getting a little dizzy.”

“Here, let me help you.” Wyatt moved right up against Corbin and carefully lowered his arms around his admirer, pressing his bare stomach into Corbin’s shirt and supporting his weight. “I got you now, stud. And since we’re so close now, why don’t you check out my lats?”

Corbin obeyed, and slipped his arms around Wyatt. The wing-like muscles were broad and firm and filled up the back of his polo shirt. It was like hugging a massive oak tree, but one was that was friendly and comforting. Corbin leaned into the muscular Assistant Manager, and then rested his head on Wyatt’s firm shoulder.

Corbin smiled and closed his eyes. “Your boyfriend must be crazy. How could he not love a chest, arms, and lats that are so big and powerful?”

Wyatt whispered into Corbin’s ear. “Thank you. But there’s more – I’ve saved the best for last.”

“What could be better than this?” thought Corbin.

Wyatt leaned down a little and folded his left arm under Corbin’s knees, sweeping him off his feet. Corbin clasped his hands together around Wyatt’s neck, surprised at how little effort it took the muscleman to pick him up. Wyatt gracefully walked out of the employee break room and carried Corbin over to one of the display beds in the deserted mattress department. He gently lay Corbin down on a bed with a green and yellow plaid quilt, and then climbed on top of him.

Wyatt propped his torso up with his elbows, with his chest nuzzling against Corbin’s chest, and his lips only a few inches above Corbin’s lips. He stroked back a few strands of Corbin's hair off his forehead with his left hand and asked, “How does the whole package feel? Too big?”

Corbin was pinned underneath Wyatt, but he wasn’t scared at all, knowing that any second now the formula would kick in. But he was having second thoughts about stealing the muscle from such a nice person. “Maybe I should have looked harder for an asshole who used his muscle to bully people...maybe I should break contact before Wyatt loses everything he worked so hard for?”
141131.title: Steal muscle from another person for himself

Corbin could not go through with it. Quickly, he took his little hands off of this prize bull of a man & held onto the bed instead. "Take me," he said

As commanded, the horny Wyatt, stuck his tongue through Corbin's lips and the two kissed passionately for about a minute. Corbin was arroused

Watt broke contact to move to Corbin's ear, tongued him there for about another minute & whispered into his ear, "I need you so badly right now."

Watt sat up over Corbin and pulled his own shirt off over his head & tossed it aside. Corbin moaned as he looked over the big strapping he-man. Watt clearly liked the attention as he flexed his left bicep saying, "BIG". Then flexed his right bicep saying, "Powerful." Flexed both saying "strong". The two men hugged each other passionately for about ninety seconds with their hands all over each other, consumed with lust. Corbin knew he had to quickly get away from this hunk or he might regretfully remove the muscle from the man of his desire. He pleaded to be let go.

141132.content:
A few months late and Corbin was ready with a new plan. Everything had been tested, and he was confident that it would be successful.

He stood in the center of the school science’s lab, his home away from home, waiting for his prey and listening to the gentle ticking of the clock on the wall behind him. He knew it wouldn’t be long before things would be very different for him.

“I have to be strong. I was meant to be strong,” Corbin said quietly. "I can’t be weak.” He once again thought about the stupid nickname that Garrett called him, the jibes alluding that he was less masculine than others and needed to "join a gym," and the whole thing with his girlfriend, Janna, dumping him because Garrett told her to do it. Reflecting on all those things, he knew he had to go forward with the plan and teach the jock a lesson.

After a few more minutes, he began to hear footsteps in the hallway outside the lab. He turned to check the time on the clock, and caught sight of himself in the mirror on the wall. Short and scrawny, just barely less than 100 pounds, with brown hair, brown eyes, and a wisp of a profile that made him look more like a boy than his current age of 22 – but that was all about to change.

“Here we go,” Corbin thought with a smile.

The lab door swung open and in walked Garrett with a scowl upon his handsome face, which though extraordinary in its beauty, was not necessarily the first thing that most people noticed. Usually, most eyes went right to his well-developed body – even in the winter when bundled up to stay warm, one couldn’t miss the barrel chest, bulging arms, and beefy legs of Garrett Oxley.

But this was the summer – the Saturday after school had gotten out – and Garrett was wearing only a pair of navy blue workout shorts and white sneakers, so his glorious physique was hard to miss. Already tan from his daily jogs and pumped up from his workout earlier in the day, his muscles were the envy of every guy on campus. He had always been a good athlete, but since he started lifting weights when he was 14, his body had grown bigger in all the right places, changing him from a skinny kid into a 200-pound teen hunk. He was already captain of the college football and baseball teams, even though he was only a junior, and big things were expected from the stud during his senior year.

The media had certainly picked up on his prowess on the playing field, and regular stories appeared about him in the local paper. It didn’t hurt that besides the sculpted body, Garrett had also been blessed with blond hair, blue eyes, a killer smile and deep dimples that only enhanced his appeal. One picture on the front page of the Tipton Gazette and the publisher could ensure that issue would be sold out all over town.

But at this moment, it wasn’t the muscles or the tan or the hair or the dimples that Corbin noticed. It was the mere presence of Garrett in the lab that made him happy because everything had fallen perfectly into place.

“OK, Dupe, I got your note,” said Garrett, looking down to read the crumpled piece of paper in his left hand. “I know your secret and am going to tell everyone. Meet me in the lab. What secret? What are you up to?”

Corbin’s smile got a little bigger. “First off, I am in no way a dupe - it's you who will be the dupe today. And secondly, Garrett, I don’t really know any secrets about you. I just figured that everyone has a few skeletons in their closet – even those at the top of the social strata such as yourself – and you would think I had figured one of yours out.”

Garrett’s furrowed his brow and the scowl disappeared into a look of confusion. “But if you had wanted to talk, why not just call me up?”

“I needed to see you alone. If you thought I was about to reveal an embarrassing tidbit, there was a much stronger chance you wouldn’t invite a buddy along.”

“You’re an odd one, Corbin, but OK, I’ll bite – why did you need to see me alone?” asked Garrett as he walked toward the nerd. He stopped about four feet in front of the smaller guy and looked down into his dark eyes.

Corbin surprised himself by not backing up as Garrett moved forward. “Because I have something to show you. Something that’s going to make a big difference around here.”

Garett dropped the note on a desk, and then crossed his thick veiny arms across his meaty pecs. “And what would that be?”

Max reached into his pocket with his left hand and pulled out an object that somewhat resembled a clear green plastic water pistol, only it was full of electronics instead of liquid. “It’s my latest invention. Something that will help me take the best and make it better.”

The confused look on Garrett's face returned, only this time with a hint of concern. “The best of what?”

“The best of you,” replied Corbin. And then he fired.

A blazing beam of light sprang out of the gun, hitting Garrett right in the middle of his smooth sculpted mid-section. Surprised at first, he slowly looked down and realized he was unable to move out of its path. As he struggled in place, however, he could feel a warmth seeping across him - it started at his middle and gently fingered its way across his entire body.

A few seconds later the beam subsided, the wearm feeling dissipated, and Garrett’s control of his body resumed. “What the heck was that? What did you do to me?”

“To you, nothing. Well, except make you second-best.”

Garett looked down and took a quick scan of his body – his muscles seemed to be the same size, so he was unclear what Corbin had meant. He flexed his left arm and cupped his bicep in his right hand, feeling the heft and shape and strength of his python. “Second best to whom?”

“Why, to me, of course?” replied Corbin, as he set the gun down on the counter next to him, waiting for the affect to take place.

Did the gun work, and if so, what did it do?
141132.title: Replicate someone's muscle for himself

choices: "You're wrong...I only meant to help you!"
"I'm so very sorry...I take back eveything mean I ever said!"
"I was only joking!  I never meant to hurt your feelings!"
1411321.content:
The gun had indeed worked just as Corbin planned.

Garrett remained confused until he realized that Corbin was transforming – morphing really – into something beyond his comprehension. "Holy mackerel, Corbin! You're growing!"

Corbin looked down and saw the same thing – his body was exploding with size! He could feel pound after pound of muscle being added to his frame, changing him from a science nerd into a young Hercules. His pectorals pulsed outward, rising like twin iron soufflés and creating tiny rips in his green plaid oxford shirt. They started as small slits in the fabric but grew more and more pronounced with each passing second.

“The ladies are going to have a hard time keeping their hands off of these,” said Corbin as he reached up to feel the hardness of his newly engorged chest muscles.

Then he noticed his biceps and triceps growing, just as if he had suddenly done years worth of curls and pulldowns within a few seconds. Like balloons inflating, he could feel them growing inside his skin, filling with potency and power.

"Grow, grow, grow!" Corbin chanted to himself.

His arms kept expanding until the poor cloth of his sleeves could no longer take it and the massive muscles simply burst right out of them. Corbin reached up and ripped off the rest of his shirt with one quick motion, exposing his newly sculpted torso.

“Awesome! It’s so much better than I expected it would be!” bellowed Corbin, in a voice that was deeper and richer than it had been just moments earlier. He flexed his swollen left bicep into a steel ball and cupped it with his right hand, just as he had seen Garrett do, and then looked over at his classmate and gave a quick smirk.

Garrett gasped at what he was seeing – muscles were popping out everywhere on Corbin. His face may have still looked like that of a boy, but his body resembled that of a Greek god.

“He’s HUGE! Everywhere!” thought Garrett as he scanned Corbin’s body. In addition to his arms and pecs, the nerd’s neck, traps, and deltoids grew beefier with each passing moment. The formerly best built student at the university was suddenly very envious of the dramatic taper between Corbin’s winglike lats and shredded abs.

Corbin continued his sudden growth spurt – he obviously wasn’t done yet. But he didn’t have time to revel in the growth of his upper body as he realized his legs were also growing bigger and bigger. Just as he had down with his shirt, he reached down with a firm grip and tore his black slacks completely off, leaving him clad only in his shoes, socks, and a skintight pair of white underwear that was hugging his bubblebutt for dear life.

“Dang, my legs feel so powerful! Like I could lift a mountain!” roared Corbin as he squatted up and down a few times.

Garrett was becoming more and more concerned as Corbin took up more and more space. He began to back away a little as he realized he was no longer looking down at the formerly five foot tall student – clearly this hulk was growing up as well as out.

“If I’m 6'2", he’s got to be at least 6'4",” thought Garrett.

For another 30 seconds Corbin continued his transformation from chump to champ, gaining more and more muscle. He glanced back in the mirror that had shown him to be a weakling only minutes earlier and saw nothing but raw power in his reflection now. Not knowing why, he hit a most muscular pose and could feel a stirring deep down within – something raw and animalistic made him let out a powerful roar as he flexed.

Then he turned his attention back to Garrett, who had also felt something instinctive and took a few more steps farther away from Corbin.

“How…how…did you…what…”

Corbin advanced toward the former BMOC. “Like I said, little Garrett, I took the best and made it better. My little invention over here was programmed to take the best quality of someone, enhance it, and let those enhancements flow back to the operator. In your case, your best asset is your physicality, which I took and enhanced for myself. And now, as you can see, I’m certainly bigger and better in that department.”

Garrett was becoming more and more worried and retreated toward the door in which he entered. But Corbin was getting closer and closer with every step of his giant tree trunk legs.

“I don’t believe it!”

Corbin laughed. “What don’t you believe? Are you doubting my scientific genius - surely not, since the process clearly worked. Or are you denying that I’m bigger than you?”

Garrett gulped. He had stepped back and was now up against the door to the lab, but Corbin had moved forward enough to put his palm on the door and prevent it from opening with his newfound strength.

“Come on, little man, flex for me.”

“What?” asked Garrett. His deep blue eyes were filled with fear.

“You heard me! Since you can't seriously doubt my genius, you must be doubting that I'm bigger than you. So flex your arm so we can see who’s the top dog around here!”

Garrett didn’t need to be told again and quickly raised his left arm – his bicep bulged up, filling with the strength it took him years to accumulate.

Corbin took his meaty right paw and put it on Garrett’s arm. “Nice. Small but nice. About 16 inches, right?”

“Almost 17, the last time I measured,” replied Garrett.

“And what about mine? Is it bigger than that?” asked Corbin as he flexed his left arm.

Garrett stopped flexing and put both hands on Corbin’s bicep, but he couldn’t get them all the way around the gigantic mound. He was blown away by the size and hardness of the muscle and could barely get the words out. “I dunno. Must be…at least…20 inches.”

Corbin smiled. “Yeah, quite a bit bigger indeed. And I’m sure they’ll prove to be quite a bit stronger as well. All those records you set in the weight room aren’t going to last much longer, are they? It’ll be as if you never accomplished anything at all.”

Garrett frowned at the thought. He had been lifting every day for years and was so proud of the records he had set in the weight room, and now Corbin would be able to wipe them all away in an instant.

“How can this be happening? What’s going on?” thought the confused athlete.

“And it’s not just the weight room where your records will fall. I’ll be joining the football team and the baseball team – whatever position you played, I’ll be taking that spot.”

Garrett’s eyes grew wide and tears began to form. “What?”

“Yes, indeed, my puny friend, your touchdown record and home run record will soon be mine as well. All those scouts who used to come looking for you are only going to notice me.”

Garrett tried to maneuver away from his tormentor, but Corbin firmly put his hands on his shoulders and prevented him from moving. “You can’t do that. I mean, you’re only one person – I can play other positions. I can still be on the team and keep my scholarship.”

Corbin shook his head. “I’m afraid that won’t be happening, Garrett. From this moment on, I’m banning you from the teams. I don’t want anyone taking the spotlight off of me. Oh, and I’ll be banning you from the school weight room and the gym in town as well.”

“You can’t…you wouldn’t…”

Corbin pressed in a little harder, positioning his groin right up against Garrett’s midsection. “Seriously, little boy, didn’t you just see the size of my bicep? I’m the new king of the castle around here, and you will do as I say. Or you’ll regret it.”

“No, you can’t do that. I’ll lose my muscles. I worked so hard for them – I’ll end up a weakling!”

“Exactly. Maybe we’ll get together once a week just so I can measure how small you’ve gotten.” Corbin moved his hands from Garrett’s shoulders to his prized biceps. “We’ll watch these nasty muscles atrophy until you can’t even see them anymore. You’ll be barely able to carry your school books by the time graduation rolls around.”

Frustrated by the thought of losing his body, Garrett threw a punch into Corbin’s stomach, but the rigid muscles of his midsection stopped his blow cold.

Corbin laughed. “That the best you can do? Just wait until you haven’t worked out for a few months – you’re just going to get punier and punier. Maybe I'll even force feed you to add some flab to your frame so you look even worse!"

Sadness permeated Garrett’s whole being. He had worked so hard on perfecting his physique for so long, and now everything was being taken away. Not playing sports? Not working out? Losing his muscles? Getting fat? It was almost too much to bear.

“Why are you doing this?” Garrett croaked feebly. “I have to be strong. I was meant to be strong. I can’t be weak.” If Corbin hadn’t pressed him up against the door, he surely would have fallen to the ground.

“I wanted to see your face as I took away you position of power. I wanted to watch as you went from the top of the heap to bottom of the barrel.”

“Me? What have you got against me?” asked Garrett.

That response seemed to anger the big hulk, and he pressed harder and squeezed his victim up mercilessly against the door. “Are you joking? After all the things you’ve done to me. The name-calling? The taunts? Taking away my girlfriend?”

“Your girlfriend?”

“Don’t play dumb, Garrett. I know it was you who told Janna to stay away from me. We were just about to go all the way, when suddenly she dumped me like a sack of dirt. My one chance at true happiness and you took it all away. So I’m taking everything away from you in return!”

“But Corbin,” sputtered Garrett....

"There's a buffet around the corner. We'll eat there and then workout before I have to head off to work. Weren't you majoring in business or something. If you want I could hire you as an intern. I also have a buddy that needs someone to work for his company. He'll be willing to pay any price."

"Thanks Dad."

"Don't mention it. I'll do anything for my favorite boy. Let's get going or else they'll charge us for the lunch buffet. I for one don't feel like paying an extra $2.00 just to eat."

Justin and his dad drive to the local buffet. The name of the buffet was Tensuya's Grand Kitchen. As they entered they were greeted by a tall and well toned cashier who was Justin's age.

"Hello boys, you made it just in time for Friday Breakfast Mayhem. Let's see. That will be $12.50 for both of you fine fine gentlemen." The cashier said as she stared at Justin in awe.

"Thank you Miss." Justin replied as he and his dad went to fill their plates with food.

Throughout their meal Justin and Dad talk about what's has been happening in their lives.

"I see. Looks like Patrick is just like your mother. ****, I hated how she would always nag me for eating junk food and smoking. The only thing I've kept up with after our marriage was going to the gym. Your mother just posted her newest photos of herself for her magazine called Ageless Youth. She's even going as far as to include your airhead of an older brother's bodybuilding competitions and workouts. That showoff really needs to learn some respect."

"I just can't believe how much you make dad. You make more than Patrick does."

"That's because I know how to work in good deals. ****, looks like we'll have to do the workout after I work. My client needs me to meet with in the next half hour."

Just as Justin and Dad were about to leave the cashier stopped Justin.

"Pardon me sir, but do you have any other plans today?" the cashier asked in a flirtatious tone.

Justin didn't know what to say. He's had dates before despite being the fatter bro., but most of his dates ended with him breaking up with the girl due to the fact that girls only used Justin so they could get to Patrick.

"Umm... I..."

"How cute! Looks like the teddy bear doesn't know what to say. We'll just exchange numbers and talk later big boy."

"Thanks."

"No thank you Justin. Can't wait to see ya." said the cashier known as Lacey Twister.

Justin then waves goodbye with a mixed feeling of joy and nervousness.

"Looks someone knows how to pick up the ladies."

"It's nothing. I'm afraid the moment she sees Patrick she'll start cheating on me like all of my past girlfriends."

"Don't worry I can give you some advice on how to make sure a girl doesn't leave ya. As an ex-jock and a fat guy I know the best of both worlds." Dad said as he lit his cigarette and started smoking before entering the car.

The men follow the young lady through a door and enter the pub with heavy dark paneling and wood furniture and a bar backed by hundreds of bottles. Three walls were authentic and historic and the fourth was glass with a view or the city and the mountains in the distance.

He then reached down and effortlessly picked up his unconscious opponent and slung him over his very broad right shoulder and got him into the car. Buck then got into the driver's seat, spent about 30 seconds admiring all the features that the trick-out truck had, and then drove off to Horatio's house.

They arrived a few minutes later, and Buck again picked up Horatio and carried him to the large house with the meticulously landscaped yard. "Damn nice place you got here, Horatio."

Using the key, Buck opened the front door and then gently set his load down on the couch in the living room. He was going to leave, but started looking around and was quite impressed - obviously his attacker did have a pretty sweet life. Big new truck, huge house full of expensive furniture, electronics, and gym equipment (that clearly didn't get used very much), and a private back yard with a pool. It was everything that Buck had wanted for his life, but he was still young and hadn't quite figured out how to make that kind of money yet.

Horatio woke up and wasn't sure where he was at first, but then realized he was on the couch in his living room. He also realized he had a very bad headache, and that it was still dark outside. Horatio glanced over at the clock on the wall, which said it was 3:15am.

Slowly he hoisted his bulk up and treied to recall what had happened. He searched his memory, but after driving back to the lounge and confronting the stud who had been making advances on his ex-wife, he couldn't remember anything else.

So Horatio decided to take some aspirin and go to bed, so he headed for the hallway leading to his bedroom. But as he passe dthe kitchen, he noticed the light on leading to the basement and he heard noises coming from down there. "Is one of the boys here? At 3:15 in the morning?" he thought.

Cautiously he crept down the staircase to the basement. Horatio had bought a bunch of gym equipment a few years back thinking he might workout at home from time to time, but he always ended up in the living room scarking down pizza and watching TV to relax.

He glanced into the workout area and was surprised to see the young man he had fought. The guy was shirtless, sweaty, and doing curls with some giant dumbbells that had pumped up the size of his already mammoth biceps. The young man looked up, smiled, and said, "Hey, you're up. I was wondering when the alcohol would wear off."

Horatio charged down the stairs, causing his belly and moobs to jiggle, and asked, "What in tarnation are you doing here?"

"You asked me to come here. don't you remember?"

Horatio took another step froward closer to the stud and responded, "I certainly did not!"

Buck put the dumbbells down and walked back to Horatio, purposely putting his massively muscles chest in the older man's face. He had spent some time while Horatio was unconscious reading his emails and personal letters and learning all about the guy so he was prepared. "Sure ya did. After our fight we went inside, had a few more drinks, and talked about stuff. You told me how embarassed you were for letting yourself go, how much you wanted to get your wife back, and that you were too embarrassed to ask your son the bodybuilder to pump iron with you. I offered to be your live-in fitness trainer and nutritionist to help get you back on track."

"I did?"

"Yeah, you even mentioned a father-son bodybuilding tournament that you thought about competing in with your kid. I think his name is Patrick, right?"

Horatio was shocked that the stranger knew the last fact. He had picked up a flyer about the contest a few weeks prior, but he had carefully hidden it so nobody would find out about it. But he couldn't deny that he did have a desire to get back in shape.

"OK, so maybe that did all happen. But if we go through with this deal, I need two things. First, I need to know your name."

The big muscleman reached out his hand to shake. "Buck. Buck Montana."

Horatio shook the big paw of his new trainer. "And secondly..."

Then they went to the sporting equipment store and bought a bunch of new equipment that Buck insisted that they need (beyond the benches, barbells, and dumbbells he already had) to help Horatio achieve peak levels of fitness.

A few hours later the workout equipment was delivered, and in the meantime Buck made arrangements for daily post-workout massages for both men, which he told Horatio would help him grow a lot faster.

Within the space of a few hours, Buck had convinced Horatio to spend almost $20,000 and the older man hadn't even batted an eye. Buck knew that at least for the next few months he had set himself up on easy street and was excited to live a comfortable life for at least the time being.

15121221211123.content:
Patrick was walking down to the bar to see if he could have any luck with the ladies. Patrick was always one to drink in moderation. If he ever got drunk he feared it would ruin his reputation, especially if he missed a competition. His coach already was a strict guy and he didn't want to do anything to get on his bad side. It's also ironic that his coach is actually his uncle from his mother's side of the family. Yet as Patrick continued his walk to the bar he was baffled as to why the ladies were choosing fat guys over him. Patrick didn't even know that his ex-girlfriend broke up with a while ago until earlier today when she sent him a text back about going out. When Patrick finally arrived at the bar he saw a few girls there just chatting or dancing on the dance floor.

"May I help you sir?" said the bartender as she was wiping off a glass.

"Can I have the house special?"

"Alright, that's one Midnight Dream. Anything else to go with your drink?" the bartender asked.

Patrick thought for a moment. He then thought about how well his diet has been and decided that he could afford to cheat tonight.

"I'll also have a nacho platter as well."

"Alright, Your order shall be ready in a few minutes." replied the bartender as she winked at Patrick.

Patrick then realized how hot and attractive the bartender was. She looked like she was about 6' or 6'1" if he guessed correctly and that she had black hair with emerald eyes and had reasonable tan, which he guessed was natural for he felt like she was from a Hispanic heritage. Yet something was familiar about this woman. It then dawned on him. It was Maria Morado. If his memory served him correctly Maria was the best looking geek during high school and had many people ask her out only for her turn them down.

Two minutes later his order was ready.

"Here you go Patrick." Maria said.

"Thanks Maria."

"Your welcome."

As Patrick enjoyed his brew and snack he noticed that the bar's interior was more akin to that of a science fiction movie. Patrick knew one thing for sure. Maria was still the same. But little did he know was that Maria enhanced his order with magic. Maria used a love potion when she was making Patrick's meal since she had trouble speaking to men. Back in high school whenever a guy would ask her out she would get flustered and wind up saying no. Even as a bar owner she had a hard time asking guys out. So she figured that if she spiked Patrick's order with a love potion it would help her get comfortable when speaking to a man for more than five minutes without getting flustered.

Rick smiled. "I know that's lightweight for a sumo but considering that I used to compete at 215, I've come a long way."
"Rick san very good student." Mariko said softely. "Very nice meeting you gentlemen."
Mariko took the agreements and left the room.
"Mariko and I will be married when I reach 350." Rick said, "She has her standards. Her father was a sumo, may he rest in peace. Nearly 600 pounds when he retired."
"Must be nice to be an athlete and not have people nagging you about being overweight. I'm healthy, work out and everyboey is on me for bing fat. Nobody every bugs a sumo." Haratio sighed in frustration.
"True enough." Rick agreed. "I get looks but nobody actually says any thing to me about my weight."
"And you can eat anything you like?" Justin piped up. "Any time?"
"Well the traditional sumo diet is healthy stuff - Chanco. It's a stew with chicken and vegetables. Not a lot of fat. But the truth is it's all quantity. Sumo's just eat a lot. Sure I enjoy whatever I like but the heart of the traning is spending long hours stuffing my gut to overflow with chanco and plenty of beer."
"Must be nasty stuff." Justin asked.
"Not nasty at all." Rick replied. "It's not gourmet, just pleasant and filling. When you eat like a sumo, you need simple filling food not fancy cuisine. No heavy spices or fat laden sauces to mess up your digestion. Frankly it's just another workout packing my tank as full as possisble."
This entire idea was something new for Justin. Eating was a pleasant pastime and he liked the rick variety of fattening items in his daily routine. But an eating workout was an entirely new concept for him. He might like it.
Horatio's mind was going in a different direction. Horatio's life was pretty good. He'd come to terms with being fat. He kept in shape but didn't go crazy about it. He'd work out when it was convenient but not on a rigid schedule.. He ate pretty much the same way and he didn't worry about the consequences. Still it bugged him when people told him he should lose weight. And in this crazy health-obsessed world, everyon seemed to feel free to tell other people what to do. He fantzsized about just telling people he was a sumo wtrestler and shutting them up.
"Well, nice to get you on board with my project, H. I'll get my project manager to call you to get started. Good meeting you Justin. You've got your Dad's good looks and some nice heft. You ever thing about becoming a Sumo? I could get you a good deal on training."
Riding home in the car, both men's minds were spinning. H was thinking about how people would react when he announced that he was going Sumo. Maybe he should do it. Justin was fantasizing about becoming the second twin to go pro. What a pair they would make - Patrick the bodybuilder and Justin the Sumo.

And she hadn't found anyone to love her quite like Horatio. She wasn't cut out to be a couger and men her age seemd to want younger women. She smiled and H and accepted a kiss on the cheek. "So here's the deal. I'm starting a weight gaining resort."

Horatio and his son looked at each other in confusion, then looked back at Rick.

"Ha!" he added. "That's the same look I get from everyone until I show them the research. Look, for all the new chatter about eating healthy and gluten-free and all that crap, there's a market for gluttony out there. Big people with big wallets who don't give a damn except chasing after pleasure. It's this billion dollar industry and I aim to get a piece of it."

"So people would sign up specifically to gain weight?" asked Justin.

"No, not necessarily. It's not like we will weigh them when they arrive and again when they leave. But we're taking the feeder movement and bring it into the mainstream. All of our marking materials will be geared toward super-rich folks who wants to experience true culinary adventures in an opulent setting. The very best food, available all of the time, and served by the employee of your choice. We'll have a full staff of feeders who look like you want them to look like, if you get my drift."

Horatio nodeed. "Sounds quite decadent. And profitable."

"Oh, yeah," added Rick. "Gonna make me a killing. I want to open by next summer to take advantage of the tourist season. Think you can build it for me by then, H?"

Justin's dad replied. "I can do anything for the right amount of money, Rick."

"That's what I wanted to hear. "And your son, here. Justin right? I think we can use you, too, if you are looking for a job."

"Definitely. What did you have in mind?" asked the younger Bigg.

"You've almost got the perfect look for our marketing materials. Young, blond, and hefty. But I need you to get a little bit bigger first. Add some muscle and some fat. Could you do that for me?"

Justin smiled. "Gaining weight is my specialty."

Rick stood up to leave, but handed Justin a card before he left. "Great. Meet me at this address tomorrow...

1522.content:
"My goal is to become a heavyweight wrestler and double my weight," Justin said.

Patrick looked at his brother as if he were insane. Was Justin trying to toy with him or is he being serious?

"Are you kidding? So you think you can be a wrestling superstar by getting fatter? That's ridiculous."

Justin calmly walked out of the room, ignoring Patrick completely. Justin walked in the kitchen to get dinner ready. However, unknown to both brothers their cousin Mildred pulled up in front of their house.

Five minutes later the doorbell ramg. Justin waited a minute to see if Patrick would stop being a jerk for once and answer the door. After the doorbell rang again Justin put down his mixing bowl and headed toward the door.

Once he opened the door he was shocked to see his cousin casually standing on his porch. Mildred's red hair blew lightly in the cool evening breeze. Her blue eyes twinkled as she looked at Justin.

"Justin! Long time no see. It's been three years since I've last seen you," Mildred said as she embraced her cousin in a bear hug.

"It's good to see you too, Mildred. What brings you here?" Justin asked.

"Business as usual. I'm opening up a new shop in town. So where's that cocky jerk, Patrick. That man has some nerve forgetting to answer my calls."

"I heard that," Patrick said as he came to the door.

Justin usher Mildred inside before returning to preparing dinner. As Justin was preparing dinner, Patrick and Mildred were in a heated conversation. As long as they could remember Patrick and Mildred never got along that well, but they have grown to respect each other as the years passed though.
1522.title: Become a heavyweight wrestler and double my weight

info.brief_description: Muscle/fat gaining with twin brothers - one's tubby & one's a bodybuilder. 300 GP/chap!
info.description:
This story will be about weight gain (both muscle and fat). Patrick and Justin Bigg are twin brothers, but nobody ever gets them mixed up. Patrick is a professional bodybuilder who keeps his physique in perfect shape, and Justin is an overweight college student. These 22 year olds both have blond hair and blue eyes, and 6'2" tall, and weigh 225 pounds, but they don't have much else in common. Or do they? Patrick sometimes wishes he could lead the carefree lifestyle of his brother, and Justin sometimes wonders what it would be like to be in great shape.

New chapter are encouraged (thanks!), but please no incest or vore. Anything else is fine, and feel free to introduce new directions and new characters.

I'll award 300 gift points for each well-written chapter (at least a paragraph). Thanks!!

(Update from 1/24/17 - Sorry I've been away for a while, but I was writing my first full-length story, From Bruiser to Loser, which is now available on Amazon if anyone is interested. I promise to add more chapters to The Bigg Brothers very soon!).
